Chairman Mr. McMahon changed the future of WWE by revealing the Commissioners of Raw and SmackDown Live, and promptly tasked them with hiring new General Managers for both brands. Also, a huge upset in Raw's Battle Royal determined the No. 1 contender for the Intercontinental Title, and The New Day got a frightening wake-up call when they ventured into the Wyatt Compound.

Dean Ambrose defended his WWE Championship against Seth Rollins in Raw's main event, but he wasn't holding the title when Raw went off the air. Find out what transpired after the broadcast on WWE Network, one night before new Raw and SmackDown Live General Managers Mick Foley and Daniel Bryan make history in the 2016 WWE Brand Extension Draft.

After two grueling Fatal 4-Way Matches set the stage for an intense Raw main event clash between Finn Bálor and Roman Reigns, it was the athletic Irishman who put away The Big Dog, earning the right to face Seth Rollins for the newly created WWE Universal Champion at SummerSlam. Find out how Reigns congratulated Bálor after the bout, four weeks before The Biggest Event of the Summer.

After Paul Heyman celebrated the “politically incorrect” form of entertainment Brock Lesnar will bring to his SummerSlam bout with Randy Orton in three weeks, SmackDown Live Superstar Randy Orton stormed the ring and laid out The Beast Incarnate with a well-timed RKO! What repercussions await The Viper following this attack?

After crashing Rusev and Lana’s post-wedding “celebration” with the WWE Universe on Raw, Roman Reigns targeted the United States Champion once again with a powerful Spear at the end of the night. Will The Bulgarian Brute lose his coveted title at SummerSlam, mere weeks after tying the knot with The Ravishing Russian?

The Architect’s search for The Demon King ended in horrifying fashion on Raw, when Finn Bálor’s otherworldly alter ego emerged on Raw to confront his WWE Universal Championship opponent. Does Seth Rollins know what he’s getting into this Sunday at SummerSlam?

Newly crowned WWE Universal Champion Finn Bálor relinquished his title on Raw, one night after he was injured while battling Seth Rollins for Team Red's flagship prize at SummerSlam. A series of bouts throughout the night determined that Roman Reigns, Big Cass, Seth Rollins and Kevin Owens will clash in a Fatal 4-Way Match for the vacated championship, live next Monday! Find out who these Superstars defeated to qualify, and get all the details on Bayley's Team Red debut.

Triple H resurfaced on Raw to dramatically alter the complexion of its Fatal 4-Way Elimination Match main event, attacking both Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins to pave the way for a Kevin Owens WWE Universal Championship victory! Why did The Game choose The Prizefighter to be the new standard-bearer for Team Red?

What began as a coronation for newly minted WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens ended in utter chaos for The Prizefighter, who must defend his title against Seth Rollins on Sept. 25 at Clash of Champions. Not only that, if Roman Reigns can defeat Owens one-on-one next Monday night, that title bout becomes a Triple Threat Match! Is "The Kevin Owens Show" already facing cancellation?

After Seth Rollins interfered in Raw’s main event, where Roman Reigns battled Kevin Owens for the chance to be added to Clash of Champions’ huge WWE Universal Championship Match, Raw General Manager Mick Foley restarted the bout. However, that didn’t stop another Superstar fromintervening in the contest and preventing a Triple Threat Match at Raw’s first New Era pay-per-view. Who distracted Reigns to help secure a victory for The Prizefighter?

In a perilous Raw main event, Roman Reigns collided with WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens inside a steel cage, leaving both Superstars worse for wear six nights before WWE Clash of Champions. The out-of-control action continued after the bell, however, as Rusev and Seth Rollins joined the fray and The Architect took flight for the second time in a single evening.

Moments after an injured Seth Rollins was ejected from the arena by Raw General Manager Mick Foley, WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens and Chris Jericho found themselves face-to-face with Enzo Amore & Big Cass, who attempted to silence Jeri-KO. Unfortunately, though, neither “The Kevin Owens Show” nor “The Gift of Jericho” abated in an intense Team Red main event.

The Boss is back in charge! In a thrilling main event battle, Sasha Banks made Charlotte submit to the Banks Statement to become a two-time Raw Women’s Champion. Find out how Sasha defeated her former friend, and who helped her level the playing field by taking out Dana Brooke moments before the match.

The WWE flagship Monday Night Raw will air live to the world from Oracle Arena on October 10th! See Seth Rollins, Roman Reigns, Finn Balor, Kevin Owens, Sasha Banks, Charlotte, The New Day, and many more of your favorite Superstars live in action!
Find out how Seth Rollins prevented Chris Jericho from entering the WWE Universal Championship Hell in a Cell Match in three weeks, and what Paul Heyman said to bring Goldberg back to Raw for the first time in 12 years.

The RAW video plays, and we’re brought into the arena to see a big pyrotechnics display. The crowd is amped up for this show. Appearing in a WWE ring for the first time in 12 years, Goldberg agreed to come out of retirement to fight The Beast Incarnate, one-on-one. How will Lesnar respond when he appears live on Raw next Monday night?

Goldberg’s image elicits a huge reaction from the crowd. Lita will also have exclusive interviews with Charlotte and Sasha Banks.

SEE YOUR FAVORITE RAW SUPERSTARS IN ACTION LIVE:  BROCK LESNAR RETURNS TO THE TWIN CITIES LIVE!!!  DOUBLE MAIN EVENT:  SETH ROLLINS  vs.   WWE Universal Champion - KEVIN OWENS  ROMAN REIGNS vs. United States Champion- RUSEV  Plus, CHRIS JERICHO and many more!

Special Halloween Edition of Monday Night Raw! Come see the fallout of Hell in a Cell!  Seth Rollins vs. WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens   Rusev vs. United States Champion Roman Reigns  Also, see your Favorite WWE Superstars including: Chris Jericho, The New Day, Charlotte, Sasha Banks and Many Mo

Stephanie McMahon ordered WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens, U.S. Champion Roman Reigns, Seth Rollins, Chris Jericho and Braun Strowman to vent their frustrations with one another in Raw’s Fatal 5-Way Match main event. However, after the brutality they unleashed on their Team Red comrades, it’s unlikely these five Superstars will be able to see eye-to-eye in less than two weeks at Survivor Series. How can this tumultuous team unite against SmackDown LIVE?

After Paul Heyman disrespected Goldberg’s family, the WCW icon showed Brock Lesnar what awaits this Sunday at Survivor Series when he annihilated multiple security guards as The Beast Incarnate looked on. Will Goldberg display the same ferocity during his anticipated Mega Match with The Conqueror? Plus, find out what happened when SmackDown LIVE paid Team Red a pre-Survivor Series visit.

Chris Jericho might have been banned from ringside during Raw’s No Disqualification WWE Universal Championship Match main event, but he still managed to ambush Seth Rollins and help Kevin Owens retain Team Red’s greatest prize. Also on Raw, Goldberg made a jaw-dropping announcement that could put the WCW icon in line for a World Title Match at WrestleMania.

In a brutal Falls Count Anywhere Match waged all over the arena, Sasha Banks ultimately overcame Charlotte Flair to become a three-time Raw Women’s Champion in “The Queen’s” namesake city and birthplace, Charlotte, N.C. Get all the details on what might go down as one of the most incredible Raw main events of all time.

After Charlotte Flair seemingly poured her heart out to the WWE Universe and apologized for how she’s treated her father, Ric Flair, The Queen dazed The Nature Boy with a stinging slap across the face. Find out what led to the callous act of disrespect, and what newly crowned Raw Women’s Champion Sasha Banks — who dedicated her victory last week to The Nature Boy — did in response, just 13 days before their 30-Minute Iron Man Match at Roadblock: End of the Line.

The Abominable Strowman ended Raw’s blockbuster tag team main event pitting U.S. Champion Roman Reigns & Seth Rollins against WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens & Chris Jericho in destructive fashion, mercilessly laying out The Big Dog and The Architect. Did The Monster Among Men just irrevocably alter the Team Red landscape?

The Abominable Strowman ended Raw’s blockbuster tag team main event pitting U.S. Champion Roman Reigns & Seth Rollins against WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens & Chris Jericho in destructive fashion, mercilessly laying out The Big Dog and The Architect. Did The Monster Among Men just irrevocably alter the Team Red landscape?

Roman Reigns was forced to defend his United States Title against WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens on Raw, and Chris Jericho’s presence at ringside certainly seemed to tip the scales in favor of The Prizefighter. Could The Big Dog leave Chicago with the star-spangled prize slung over his shoulder?

As Goldberg returned on the debut edition of “The Kevin Owens Show” during the first Raw of 2017, several Superstars announced their intention to dominate the Royal Rumble Match. Find out who’s joining Goldberg, Brock Lesnar and Braun Strowman in this year’s over-the-top-rope classic, and why U.S. Champion Roman Reigns teamed up with Goldberg to take down The Monster Among Men.

Drink it in, maaaan: Chris Jericho is the new United States Champion after he and WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens defeated Roman Reigns in Raw’s Handicap Match main event. Find out how the curator of “The List of Jericho” snared the title that has eluded him throughout his career.

Roman Reigns, Seth Rollins & Sami Zayn joined forces against WWE Universal Champion Kevin Owens, United States Champion Chris Jericho & Braun Strowman in a massive Six-Man Tag Team Match, but the action didn’t stop when the bell rang. Find out what steel-bending carnage unfolded after the match.

For the first time since Goldberg defeated and humiliated Brock Lesnar at Survivor Series, the WCW icon and The Beast Incarnate stood face-to-face in the center of the ring in an intense preview of what we might see this Sunday in the Royal Rumble Match. As if that weren’t enough, The Undertaker mysteriously emerged to stare down both titans! Will one of these three Superstars win Sunday’s over-the-top-rope extravaganza to go on to the main event of WrestleMania?

Last night at Royal Rumble, the Raw Tag Team Titles fell into the hands of two “good brothers,” The King of the Cruiserweights was crowned and Kevin Owens retained the WWE Universal Championship under monstrously questionable circumstances. How will the Raw landscape continue to change tonight? WWE.com has some ideas.
Goldberg answers Brock Lesnar's challenge as the road to WrestleMania begins.

On Raw tonight, Charlotte defends her Women’s Championship against Bayley tonight in a Royal Rumble rematch, while Kevin Owens and Chris Jericho are set to have Festival of Friendship. Can Bayley overcome the woman that has bested her more than once over the years? Bayley is the ultimate underdog but maybe she can pull out a win tonight, or a few weeks down the line at Fastlane. Regardless, Nia Jax casts an ominous shadow over the entire division. And what exactly is a Festival of Friendship? Well we have no idea but there will undoubtedly be streamers, party hats, and maybe even a conga line. The festival aims to reaffirm the deep bond between Owens and Jericho but maybe we’ll see the ice start to crack, setting-up a WrestleMania showdown. Or maybe Goldberg will run down and Spear them both into a giant cake!

As the ring strained under their combined weight, Big Show and Braun Strowman locked up in a main event of titanic proportions, but only one of these behemoths was left standing when all was said and done. Find out which juggernaut was victorious, and how Roman Reigns factored into the post-match calamity.

Roman Reigns and Braun Strowman's WWE Fastlane contract signing broke down quickly, as both Superstars tore apart the ringside area and the ring itself to assert dominance before their match this Sunday. Despite suffering the full onslaught of The Monster Among Men, The Big Dog signed on the dotted line for what’s sure to be one of the most brutal matches of his career.

Roman Reigns showed no fear while confronting the returning Undertaker on Raw, but that defiance in the face of true darkness came at great cost to The Big Dog. What might this chilling encounter mean on The Road to WrestleMania?

Saving Raw General Manager Mick Foley from annihilation at the hands of Triple H, a seemingly recovered Seth Rollins emerged to get some payback against The Game, but The Architect’s assault was ultimately cut short. Find out how the cunning Cerebral Assassin made “The Kingslayer’s” anticipated appearance at this year’s WrestleMania even more unlikely.

One week after Roman Reigns claimed he would retire The Undertaker at WrestleMania, The Deadman emerged on Raw during The Big Dog’s main event clash with Braun Strowman. Find out how Reigns and The Phenom altered the already treacherous course of The Ultimate Thrill Ride.

Universal Champion Goldberg showed no fear as he met Brock Lesnar face-to-face just six nights before their anticipated title bout at WrestleMania, The Ultimate Thrill Ride. Find out what “ride” The Beast Incarnate took during the final moments of Raw and why their Show of Shows battle will be their most intense match yet.

On the first Raw after The Ultimate Thrill Ride, Finn Bálor made his incredible return, Raw Tag Team Champions The Hardy Boyz flew high above Luke Gallows & Karl Anderson, and WWE Hall of Famer Kurt Angle became the General Manager of WWE’s flagship show.

As Roman Reigns addressed his victory over The Undertaker at WrestleMania and weighed in on a potential Universal Championship Match against Brock Lesnar, the seemingly unstoppable Braun Strowman emerged to lay waste to The Big Dog. Get the details on the brutal assault that concluded when The Monster Among Men tipped over an ambulance with Reigns inside it!

If you thought a WWE ring wasn’t enough to contain Raw’s colossal main event pitting Big Show against Braun Strowman, you were right. Find out how these juggernauts destroyed their battleground at the close of Raw, and how Strowman shocked the WWE Universe moments later.

Following Kalisto’s surprise victory in Raw’s first-ever Dumpster Match, Braun Strowman trapped the luchador in the receptacle and hurled it off the stage. Will Roman Reigns end The Monster Among Men’s horrific rampage this Sunday at WWE Payback?

During an intense Triple Threat Match to determine whether Finn Bálor, Seth Rollins or The Miz will challenge Dean Ambrose for the Intercontinental Championship, Samoa Joe ambushed The Kingslayer while Bray Wyatt incapacitated the Irishman, helping The Miz become No. 1 contender to Dean Ambrose’s Intercontinental Championship in the process. How will The Lunatic Fringe respond?

Just seven nights before Dean Ambrose defends his Intercontinental Championship against The Miz next Monday night on Raw, Bray Wyatt preyed on The Lunatic Fringe … but he didn’t do it alone. Are Ambrose’s days with the workhorse title numbered?

Raw’s main event clash between Seth Rollins and Bray Wyatt proved that Team Red’s elite will do whatever it takes to dominate in the historic Extreme Rules Fatal 5-Way Match at WWE Extreme Rules. Find out why both The Kingslayer and Samoa Joe felt sister Abigail’s kiss.

With the historic Extreme Rules Fatal 5-Way Match on the horizon at Extreme Rules, Seth Rollins joined forces with Roman Reigns against Bray Wyatt & Samoa Joe in a chaotic Raw tag team main event. Plus, Elias Samson debuted against Dean Ambrose and Matt Hardy won the right to choose the stipulation for the Raw Tag Team Title Match on June 4 in a heated showdown against Sheamus.

Six nights before Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins battle Finn Bálor, Bray Wyatt and Samoa Joe in an Extreme Rules Fatal 5-Way Match to determine who will challenge Brock Lesnar for the Universal Championship, the two former Shield “brothers” collided in an intense main event matchup. Could The Big Dog finally defeat The Kingslayer in singles combat?

After Samoa Joe ruthlessly attacked Paul Heyman and threatened to do the same to anyone that stands in his way, Seth Rollins willingly impeded the path of his longtime nemesis and battled The Samoan Submission Specialist in an intense Raw main event. Find out if The Architect could take down the new No. 1 contender to Brock Lesnar’s Universal Championship. and which intervening Superstar played a role in the bout’s unusual conclusion.

One week after Samoa Joe put Paul Heyman to sleep with the incapacitating Coquina Clutch, Universal Champion Brock Lesnar got a piece of The Samoan Submission Machine in a wild brawl that required virtually the entire Raw locker room to break up. Find out what went down four weeks before these two juggernauts clash for Team Red’s grandest prize at the WWE Great Balls of Fire pay-per-view.

Security footage unearthed by Corey Graves revealed that Big Cass was behind the mysterious attacks on his supposed best friend Enzo Amore, and no one could have predicted what transpired moments after the truth came to light.

By winning Raw’s historic first-ever Women’s Gauntlet Match, Sasha Banks earned the right to face Alexa Bliss for the Raw Women’s Championship at the first-ever WWE Great Balls of Fire pay-per-view event on Sunday, July 9. Can The Boss humble the self-proclaimed “Goddess of WWE”?

One week after Braun Strowman brutalized Roman Reigns and tossed him into the back of an ambulance, The Big Dog retaliated with a thunderous Spear that sent both Superstars flying off the entrance ramp and onto the unforgiving pavement below. Will the seemingly unstoppable Monster Among Men suffer a similar fate when he battles a fired-up Reigns this Sunday at the first-ever WWE Great Balls of Fire pay-per-view event?

After Seth Rollins fell to the calculating Bray Wyatt for the second time in as many nights, the opportunistic A-Lister and his co-stars stormed the ring to attack the injured Kingslayer. Fortunately, Dean Ambrose and a steel chair equalizer weren’t far behind.

After weeks of speculation, Raw General Manager Kurt Angle finally revealed his secret to the WWE Universe: He's Jason Jordan's father! How will this announcement affect the career and family life of the WWE Hall of Famer?

Following a victory over The Miz and his Miztourage in a 3-on-2 Handicap Match main event on Raw, Seth Rollins extended his fist — and an olive branch — to his former Shield brother. Has The Lunatic Fringe forgiven The Kingslayer for his past transgressions?

As Universal Champion Brock Lesnar and Paul Heyman dropped a bombshell announcement on Raw, The Beast's three SummerSlam opponents collided in a hellacious Triple Threat Match for momentum. Plus, Big Show battled Big Cass for the first time ever and Raw Tag Team Champions Sheamus & Cesaro unleashed a vicious assault on both Seth Rollins and Dean Ambrose.

In what was perhaps their most brutal encounter, Roman Reigns and Braun Strowman tore each other and the arena apart in tonight’s Last Man Standing Match main event. Who gutted out the monumental victory just two weeks before SummerSlam’s hotly anticipated Universal Championship Fatal 4-Way Match?

The face-to-face-to-face-to-face encounter between Universal Champion Brock Lesnar, Roman Reigns, Braun Strowman and Samoa Joe didn’t stay civil for long. Find out what set off these powerhouse Superstars, six nights before their Fatal 4-Way Match at SummerSlam.

In John Cena’s first Raw match in more than a year, The Cenation Leader teamed up with Roman Reigns to take on The Miz and Samoa Joe in an incredible Raw main event. Also on the red brand, Braun Strowman attacked Brock Lesnar, setting the stage for a titanic Universal Championship Match at WWE No Mercy!

Alexa Bliss reclaimed the Raw Women’s Championship by defeating Sasha Banks on Raw, but her post-match celebration didn’t exactly go as "The Goddess" had planned. Also on Raw, John Cena and Roman Reigns had a heated war of words that must be heard to be believed!

Braun Strowman defeated Big Show in tonight’s Steel Cage Match main event, but it didn’t end there. In In an unbelievable feat of strength, The Monster Among Men picked up The World’s Largest Athlete and tossed him through one of the reinforced walls! How will Universal Champion Brock Lesnar respond to Strowman’s destructive message as their clash at WWE No Mercy fast approaches?

In a match never before witnessed by the WWE Universe, Braun Strowman brutalized John Cena with the steel steps, earning himself a disqualification in the process. Will Roman Reigns similarly show Cena “no mercy” when he clashes with The Cenation Leader in less than two weeks at WWE No Mercy?

Jason Jordan was victorious against The Hardy Boyz, Elias and both members of The Miztourage in Raw’s Six-Pack Challenge main event, but The Miz stole the “gold-blooded” Superstar’s spotlight at the end of the night with a savage Skull-Crushing Finale and some choice words. Will Jordan suffer the same fate this Sunday when he challenges The A-Lister for the Intercontinental Championship?

Violating a no-contact clause, Neville attacked new WWE Cruiserweight Champion Enzo Amore, one night after The Certified G stole the coveted title from The King of the Cruiserweights at WWE No Mercy. Was this retribution worth Neville throwing away his opportunity for a title rematch?

After Roman Reigns suffered a 3-on-1 beatdown at the hands of Intercontinental Champion The Miz, Cesaro & Sheamus, he received a visit from Raw Tag Team Champions Seth Rollins & Dean Ambrose, marking the first time the former members of The Shield have stood united in three years. Have The Hounds of Justice returned?

Two weeks before his scheduled WWE Cruiserweight Championship opportunity against Enzo Amore at WWE TLC, Kalisto silenced The Certified G by capturing the coveted title in a Lumberjack Match on an unbelievable Raw, which also saw the reunion of The Shield and a shocking appearance by Sister Abigail!

After Kane tore through the ring to help Braun Strowman defeat Roman Reigns in Raw’s Steel Cage Match, the team battling the returning Shield in this Sunday’s Tables, Ladders & Chairs Match at WWE TLC got a new partner in The Big Red Monster! Will the Hounds of Justice reunion be short-lived?
In a stunning moment, SmackDown Commissioner Shane McMahon and the SmackDown brand brought Raw General Manager Kurt Angle and the Raw brand under siege.

The Monster Among Men returned to Monday Night Raw to unleash total destruction on Intercontinental Champion The Miz, Bo Dallas and especially Curtis Axel. Plus, one week after Raw was brought under siege by SmackDown, Raw Commissioner Stephanie McMahon returned to take strong issue with Raw General Manager Kurt Angle, and SmackDown General Manager Daniel Bryan suffered a brutal assault courtesy of Kane.

SmackDown’s The New Day  interrupted Monday Night Raw’s main event, changing the landscape of Survivor Series when their distracting presence helped Cesaro & Sheamus defeat Seth Rollins & Dean Ambrose to become Raw Tag Team Champions. Will Team Red retaliate against the blue brand?

Braun Strowman and Kane’s latest brawl concluded when The Monster Among Men’s Running Powerslam sent both mammoth Superstars through the ring. What might this startling show of force mean for Survivor Series this Sunday, when Raw and SmackDown clash in head-to-head competition for brand supremacy?

In an intense Raw main event, Roman Reigns defeated The Miz to capture the Intercontinental Title for the first time, joining the ranks of Kurt Angle, Chris Jericho, Daniel Bryan and, yes, even Miz himself, as a Grand Slam Champion. Find out how The Big Dog finally attained the title that has eluded him throughout his career.

In a reversal of what the WWE Universe witnessed last week, Braun Strowman interrupted Kane’s main event clash against Finn Bálor and crushed The Big Red Machine’s throat with the aid of a steel chair and the ring steps.

Seth Rollins & Dean Ambrose failed to reclaim the Raw Tag Team Titles thanks in no small part to the intervention of Samoa Joe. How will The Shield repay The Samoan Submission Specialist and his new allies, Sheamus & Cesaro?

When the dust (and splinters) settled following the monstrous WWE Holiday Week Raw main event pitting Braun Strowman against Kane, Brock Lesnar still didn’t have a Universal Championship challenger for the 2018 Royal Rumble event in January. How will Raw General Manager Kurt Angle resolve this issue?

In a groundbreaking move, Raw Commissioner Stephanie McMahon revealed that female Superstars will compete in the first-ever Women’s Royal Rumble Match on Sunday, Jan. 28, streaming live on WWE Network. Who will earn a championship opportunity at WrestleMania 34 in New Orleans in April?

On the first live Christmas episode of Raw, unlikely partners Seth Rollins & Jason Jordan captured the Raw Tag Team Titles. Plus, John Cena made his Team Red return, Roman Reigns unleashed a vicious post-match assault on Samoa Joe, and Asuka officially entered the historic Women’s Royal Rumble Match for an opportunity at WrestleMania.

The Year of the Beast began in bombastic fashion, as Universal Champion Brock Lesnar found himself in a wild brawl with Kane, requiring a small army of WWE Superstars to restore the peace. Will The Big Red Machine bring that same fire when he faces The Beast Incarnate and Braun Strowman in a titanic Triple Threat Match at the Royal Rumble event?

After The Bálor Club defeated Intercontinental Champion Roman Reigns and Raw Tag Team Champions Seth Rollins & Jason Jordan, The Miz and The Miztourage assaulted The Big Dog , punctuating the attack with a brazen mockery of The Shield’s Triple Powerbomb. Is The A-Lister poised to reclaim his Intercontinental Title when he battles Reigns in two weeks on the 25th anniversary of Monday Night Raw?

Battling one-on-one for the first time since the inaugural Universal Championship Match at SummerSlam 2016, Seth Rollins and Finn Bálor held nothing back in a competitive Raw main event that concluded with a rare move from The Kingslayer's arsenal. But what role did Rollins' fellow Raw Tag Team Champion, Jason Jordan, play in the bout’s outcome?

On a night of nostalgia celebrating the incredible 25-year history of Monday Night Raw, Braun Strowman remained focused on his future — namely his Universal Championship Triple Threat Match against Kane and defending titleholder Brock Lesnar at the Royal Rumble event. Find out why current Superstars and WWE Legends alike are looking at The Monster Among Men in a whole new way.

In a Raw main event for the ages, John Cena and Finn Bálor locked up in singles action for the first time ever, vying to enter the Elimination Chamber where a Universal Championship opportunity against Brock Lesnar at WrestleMania will be on the line.

Seizing an incredible opportunity against John Cena and Braun Strowman in Raw’s main event, Elias will be the last Superstar to enter the Men’s Elimination Chamber on Feb. 25, increasing his chances of winning the perilous bout and going on to challenge Brock Lesnar for the Universal Title at WrestleMania. But The Monster Among Men was not exactly congratulatory after the bout was over.

When Raw’s Second Chance Fatal 5-Way Match ended in controversial fashion, Raw General Manager Kurt Angle revealed in a Facebook Live video that both Superstars have qualified for what will be the first-ever Seven-Man Elimination Chamber Match in WWE history!

Following Raw’s Six-Woman Tag Team Match main event, Mickie James and Raw Women’s Champion Alexa Bliss were clearly on the same page, which bodes well for Little Miss Bliss as she defends her title in the first-ever Women’s Elimination Chamber Match this Sunday, streaming live on WWE Network.

Stephanie McMahon invited Ronda Rousey to Raw to clear the air after Rousey put her husband Triple H through a table. However, after the Raw Commissioner apologized for slapping Rousey in the wake of the incident, The Cerebral Assassin inflicted some pain of his own, this time at the expense of Raw General Manager Kurt Angle.

Musical mayhem ensued when The Monster Among Men clashed with the terrified troubadour in the historic, first-ever Symphony of Destruction Match. Learn what made this instrumental clash reach a painful crescendo.

Braun Strowman forced his way into Raw’s Tag Team Battle Royal main event, and The Monster Among Men outlasted the five teams in the contest to emerge as the apparent victor. How will Raw General Manager Kurt Angle sort out the situation that seemingly puts the solitary Strowman on a collision course with Raw Tag Team Champions Cesaro & Sheamus at WrestleMania?

In one of the most bewildering matches in WWE history, “Woken” Matt Hardy battled Bray Wyatt from The Dilapidated City to the shores of The Lake of Reincarnation in The Ultimate Deletion. Find out how The Woken One ended The Great War at The Hardy Compound, and why The Eater of Worlds, as we know him, might be gone forever.

After overcoming the demonic Kane in Raw’s main event, using some moves from The Undertaker’s arsenal in the process, John Cena once again lashed out at The Deadman for failing to respond to The Cenation Leader’s WrestleMania challenge. Has The Phenom resigned himself to an eternal slumber, leaving Cena without an opponent at The Show of Shows?

Roman Reigns is down, but he’s far from out. After absorbing multiple beatings at the hands of Universal Champion Brock Lesnar, The Big Dog finally got a piece of The Beast Incarnate with a succession of Superman Punches that left Lesnar dazed. However, The Conqueror is not so easily dispatched.
Always one of the most outrageous nights on WWE's calendar, the #RawAfterMania saw Ronda's wrath, shocking returns, NXT arrivals and huge buzz over next week's WWE Superstar Shake-up.

Bobby Roode was revealed as the mystery participant in the 10-Man Tag Team Match that pitted Seth Rollins, Braun Strowman, Finn Bálor, Bobby Lashley & The Glorious One against Sami Zayn, Kevin Owens The Miz & The Miztourage. Find out what shocking turn of events sealed The A-Lister’s fate during the bout’s final moments.

Raw’s 10-Woman Tag Team Match main event descended into chaos when Ronda Rousey stormed the ring to dish out some serious damage to Mickie James’ arm. Find out what set off The Baddest Woman on the Planet before Raw concluded.

The Architect put his Intercontinental Championship on the line against The Extraordinary Man in a crowd-pleaser of a Raw main event. Find out how Monday Night Rollins emerged victorious in one of the most exciting title matches in recent history.

In the second Men’s Money in the Bank Qualifying Match on Raw, Finn Bálor defeated both Roman Reigns and Sami Zayn to join Braun Strowman in the Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match on June 17. Learn how The Extraordinary Man conquered two elite Superstars, and find out who interfered to target The Big Dog.

Although Seth Rollins once again proved himself a fighting champion by successfully defending his Intercontinental Title against Kevin Ovens in an Open Challenge as Raw traveled to the O2 Arena in the United Kingdom, KO still managed to qualify for an opportunity at the Money in the Bank Contract, as did Alexa Bliss and Bobby Roode.

Four weeks before they battle in the Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match, Braun Strowman and Finn Bálor met one-on-one in a blockbuster Raw main event. Which of these elite Superstars gained crucial momentum before their huge opportunity on Sunday, June 17?

Sasha Banks made a statement in the Last Chance Women’s Money in the Bank Qualifying Gauntlet Match, outlasting six other Superstars to secure the final spot in the Women’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match. Will she become the next Ms. Money in the Bank(s)?

The Extraordinary Man Who Can Do Extraordinary Things lived up to his moniker on Raw, when he put a punctuation mark on his brawl with Kevin Owens by executing a stunning Coup de Grâce from atop a ladder onto his bitter foe. Was this a spectacular preview of what awaits in less than two weeks in the Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match?

They might not be friends, but on Monday Night Raw, Finn Bálor and Men’s Money in the Bank contract winner Braun Strowman united against the calculating tandem of Kevin Owens and “Constable” Baron Corbin. Could WWE’s first Universal Champion and “Mr. Monster in the Bank” coexist long enough to put KO and The Constable away?

One week after losing his Intercontinental Title to Dolph Ziggler, Seth Rollins invoked his rematch clause to once again become Team Red’s fighting champion. However, with Drew McIntyre observing the action closely, The Architect faced near-impossible odds.

Braun Strowman has used all manner of implements to brutalize his enemies, but on Monday Night Raw, a portable toilet came into play. Get all the details on the altercation that had Kevin Owens down in the dumps.

Seth Rollins faced Drew McIntyre in an explosive Raw main event, and if The Architect could defeat the Scotsman, McIntyre would be barred from ringside during the 30-Minute WWE Iron Man Match for the Intercontinental Championship at WWE Extreme Rules. Will Dolph Ziggler have some extra muscle in his corner this Sunday?

After winning their respective Triple Threat Matches tonight on Raw, Roman Reigns and Bobby Lashley will square off in a rematch of their WWE Extreme Rules confrontation, and the winner will challenge Brock Lesnar for the Universal Championship at SummerSlam. Can The Big Dog punch his ticket to a showdown with The Beast, or will Lashley go 2-0 against The Guy en route to The Biggest Event of the Summer?

In a hard-fought Raw main event, Roman Reigns conquered Bobby Lashley, earning the right to challenge Brock Lesnar for the Universal Championship at SummerSlam. Can The Big Dog finally defeat The Beast Incarnate and bring Team Red’s premier title to his “yard”?

After making it clear that Paul Heyman isn’t his friend, Universal Champion Brock Lesnar attacked his longtime advocate after hitting Raw General Manager Kurt Angle with an F-5. How will Roman Reigns — who was forced to leave the building moments earlier — react to his SummerSlam opponent’s malicious onslaught?

Competing on Raw for the first time, Ronda Rousey decisively defeated Alicia Fox, despite the interference of Raw Women’s Champion Alexa Bliss. Is The Goddess getting worried about her chances against The Baddest Woman on the Planet at SummerSlam?

Once a Shield brother, always a Shield brother. Sidelined since December, Dean Ambrose made a surprise return during Monday Night Raw while Seth Rollins and Dolph Ziggler were signing the contract for their Intercontinental Championship Match at SummerSlam. With The Lunatic Fringe in his corner at The Biggest Event of the Summer to counter the threat of Drew McIntyre, is The Kingslayer primed to unseat The Showoff?

After defending his Universal Championship against Finn Bálor, a battle-weary Roman Reigns faced a seemingly inevitable Money in the Bank contract cash-in from Braun Strowman, but his Shield brothers had his back. Get all the details on this shocking Hounds of Justice reunion.

During a tag team main event pitting Universal Champion Roman Reigns and Braun Strowman against Dolph Ziggler and Drew McIntyre, The Monster Among Men betrayed The Big Dog and ultimately joined his supposed foes in taking down each member of The Shield, one by one. How might Strowman’s apparent alliance with The Showoff and The Scott Terminator change the landscape of his title clash with Reigns inside Hell in a Cell on Sept. 16?

Hours after being hauled away in police custody, The Shield were incapacitated at the hands of Braun Strowman, new Raw Tag Team Champions Dolph Ziggler & Drew McIntyre and a multitude of malicious Superstars. Can The Hounds of Justice rebound from this savagery?

Braun Strowman wanted The Big Dog and, well, he got him. After demanding a confrontation with Universal Champion Roman Reigns, The Monster Among Men took an unbelievable ride from atop the Raw announce desk through the stage itself, courtesy of a thunderous Samoan Drop. Will Strowman suffer a similarly painful fate this Sunday inside Hell in a Cell?

On a night where Roman Reigns found out that he'll be defending his Universal Title against Brock Lesnar and Braun Strowman in Saudi Arabia on Nov. 2 at WWE Crown Jewel, he also found out that he'd be defending against Raw Acting GM Baron Corbin in the main event. Also, The Undertaker revealed he won't be alone at WWE Super Show-Down, The Bellas gave Ronda Rousey backup against The Riott Squad, and more.

Despite the best efforts of Braun Strowman and Raw Tag Team Champions Dolph Ziggler & Drew McIntyre, Dean Ambrose’s brotherhood with Universal Champion Roman Reigns and Intercontinental Champion Seth Rollins has never been stronger, as evidenced by The Shield’s impressive showing against Acting General Manager Baron Corbin & AOP in a blistering six-man main event.

Triple H rushed to Shawn Michaels’ aid to even the odds against The Undertaker and Kane at the end of Raw, but The Brothers of Destruction got the upper hand, laying out the D-Generation X founders with a Double Chokeslam. Then, The Deadman drove The Game into the mat with a vicious Tombstone Piledriver. Will The Cerebral Assassin suffer the same fate when he battles The Phenom one last time at WWE Super Show-Down this Saturday?

In a WWE Super Show-Down rematch, The Shield suffered a crushing defeat to Braun Strowman and Raw Tag Team Champions Dolph Ziggler & Drew McIntyre, and Dean Ambrose suffered the pinfall. After the match, the despondent Lunatic Fringe left the arena ahead of his fellow Hounds of Justice without saying a word or looking back. What might this mean for The Shield? Also on Raw, Shawn Michaels announced his in-ring return at WWE Crown Jewel and The Bella Twins shockingly ambushed Raw Women’s Champion Ronda Rousey.

In a six-man main event rematch, The Shield battled not only Braun Strowman and Raw Tag Team Champions Dolph Ziggler & Drew McIntyre, but their own internal strife, as repeated miscommunication between Dean Ambrose and Intercontinental Champion Seth Rollins nearly brought Dirty Deeds upon The Architect. Find out how The Hounds of Justice prevailed and why Ziggler & McIntyre incurred the wrath of The Monster Among Men.

On the same night that Universal Champion Roman Reigns was forced to relinquish his title after his leukemia returned, his Shield brothers captured the Raw Tag Team Titles in his honor. But as the smoke cleared on their emotional victory, The Lunatic Fringe unleashed a shocking post-match assault on The Architect.

Less than a week before facing The Brothers of Destruction in tag team action for the first time at WWE Crown Jewel, D-Generation X seemed like they were a man short as Triple H stared down The Undertaker & Kane on his own. However, Shawn Michaels hit the ring and nailed The Deadman with Sweet Chin Music! DX's celebration was short, though, as they witnessed The Phenom rise moments later. Will The Undertaker be as resilient this Friday at WWE Crown Jewel?

Competing in singles action on Raw for the first time in more than 12 years, WWE Hall of Famer Kurt Angle battled Drew McIntyre in the hope of replacing Baron Corbin as the captain of the Raw Men’s Survivor Series team. Find out how The Scottish Psychopath used The Olympic Hero’s arsenal against him in this incredible red brand main event. Plus, get all the details on what led to AOP’s Raw Tag Team Championship victory.

After Ruby Riott was named as the final member of the Raw Women’s Survivor Series Team, SmackDown Women’s Champion Becky Lynch attacked Raw Women’s Champion Ronda Rousey in the locker room area, marking the beginning of Team Blue’s all-out assault on the red brand. How might this change the landscape of this Sunday’s Survivor Series event?

After a night of mind games, Dean Ambrose ranted to the WWE Universe in Los Angeles about his fractured relationship with beloved Intercontinental Champion Seth Rollins. The incensed Kingslayer charged the ring to pummel The Lunatic Fringe, but Ambrose was ready, hitting his former Shield brother with two consecutive Dirty Deeds. Was this a sign of things to come when they clash for the Intercontinental Title at WWE TLC?

Baron Corbin took his authority over Monday Night Raw to new levels, naming himself “General Manager-Elect,” putting his adversaries in unfair Handicap Matches and ensuring himself a forfeit victory over an injured Braun Strowman at WWE TLC: Tables, Ladders & Chairs. Who can stop the power-hungry Lone Wolf?

After Nia Jax & Tamina prevented Raw Women’s Champion Ronda Rousey from helping Natalya fight off The Riott Squad, The Baddest Woman on the Planet got some backup in the form of The War Goddess, Ember Moon. Find out how Hot Ronda put The Irresistible Force on the defensive en route to their title collision at WWE TLC: Tables, Ladders & Chairs.

After placing the blame for Raw’s decline on the shoulders of “General Manager-Elect” Baron Corbin, Seth Rollins defended his Intercontinental Championship against The Lone Wolf in a Tables, Ladders & Chairs Match, six nights before his scheduled title bout against former Shield brother Dean Ambrose at WWE TLC.

On a night that the entire McMahon family revealed they would be overseeing both Raw and SmackDown and making the WWE Universe “The Authority,” Natalya celebrated Team Red’s new beginning with a Gauntlet Match victory, earning a Raw Women’s Championship Match against her best friend, Ronda Rousey, next Monday night on Christmas Eve.

Baron Corbin has a lot to answer for following his tyrannical reign as Raw’s “General Manager-Elect,” and Seth Rollins made Team Red’s resident Krampus pay for all of his transgressions in a Christmas Eve main event that was far from merry for The Lone Wolf. Plus, Ronda Rousey defended her Raw Women’s Title against Natalya, The Revival challenged Bobby Roode & Chad Gable for the Raw Tag Team Titles and Elias decked the halls with Bobby Lashley in a Miracle on 34th Street Fight.

In a massive New Year’s Eve main event, Raw Women’s Champion “Rowdy” Ronda Rousey teamed up with Natalya to stand up to Nia Jax & Tamina. Also on the final Raw of 2018, Dolph Ziggler battled Drew McIntyre in a brutal Steel Cage Match, Apollo Crews earned an Intercontinental Championship opportunity against Dean Ambrose, and Seth Rollins brought the fight to “The All Mighty” Bobby Lashley.

In an incredible Raw main event, Seth Rollins finally received his Intercontinental Championship rematch against Dean Ambrose, but this time, the two former Shield brothers clashed in a barbaric Falls Count Anywhere Match. Could The Kingslayer reclaim the red brand’s workhorse title? Also on Raw, John Cena returned to action on the red brand, Sasha Banks battled Nia Jax for the right to challenge Ronda Rousey for the Raw Women’s Championship, and Hulk Hogan paid tribute to his longtime friend and fellow WWE Hall of Famer, “Mean” Gene Okerlund.

After Braun Strowman’s destructive temper cost him his Universal Championship opportunity at Royal Rumble — along with $100,000 in the form of a hefty fine — Mr. McMahon scheduled a Fatal 4-Way Match to determine The Beast Incarnate’s new challenger. Find out how Finn Bálor overcame Drew McIntyre, Baron Corbin and John Cena in a hard-hitting Raw main event.

Six nights before colliding for the Raw Women’s Title at Royal Rumble, Sasha Banks and Raw Women’s Champion Ronda Rousey teamed up with their best friends in tag team action. Find out why it could be “Boss Time” for The Rowdy One in Phoenix this Sunday.

It takes a bold man to step to Universal Champion Brock Lesnar, and few are bolder than Seth Rollins. With WrestleMania 35 on the horizon, the winner of the 30-Man Royal Rumble Match interrupted a Paul Heyman tirade and slugged The Beast Incarnate in the face, making it clear who he wanted to challenge at The Show of Shows. Find out why The Kingslayer might regret this decision.

On a night WWE Hall of Famer Kurt Angle was set to make an emotional announcement to the WWE Universe, The Olympic Hero instead teamed with Braun Strowman against the disrespectful Drew McIntyre & Baron Corbin in the night’s main event. Also on Raw, Stephanie McMahon suspended the defiant Becky Lynch, and the third and final Raw duo qualified for the WWE Women’s Tag Team Championship Elimination Chamber Match.

Even though Becky Lynch swallowed her pride and apologized to the McMahon family for her recent actions, The Man must serve a 60-day suspension. As such, per Mr. McMahon, Charlotte Flair will replace The Man in her scheduled Raw Women’s Championship Match against Ronda Rousey at WrestleMania!

On a night when four standout NXT Superstars emerged on the WWE roster, Ronda Rousey defended the Raw Women’s Championship against Ruby Riott in a WWE Elimination Chamber rematch as the rest of The Riott Squad lurked at ringside. How did The Baddest Woman on the Planet fare, one night after she was brutalized by a crutch-wielding Becky Lynch?

As Raw celebrated the 70th birthday of two-time WWE Hall of Famer Ric Flair, Batista shockingly stormed “The Nature Boy’s” dressing room, dragging an incapacitated Flair through the hallway and asking Triple H, “Do I have your attention now?"

Ronda Rousey returned to the red brand to reclaim the Raw Women's Title she laid at the feet of Stephanie McMahon one week prior, but that wasn’t all that The Rowdy One had in store. After lashing out at the WWE Universe, she brutally attacked Becky Lynch, who will enter the Raw Women's Championship Match at WrestleMania if she can defeat Charlotte Flair at WWE Fastlane. Did The Baddest Woman on the Planet drastically lower The Man's chances of conquering The Queen this Sunday?

After ambushing and brutalizing Roman Reigns, Drew McIntyre faced Dean Ambrose in a Falls Count Anywhere Match, a bout demanded by The Big Dog’s unpredictable Shield brother. After brawling with The Lunatic Fringe all over the arena, The Scottish Psychopath ended the match in gruesome fashion, setting a grisly tone for The Road to WrestleMania.

After decimating Roman Reigns and Dean Ambrose one week earlier, Drew McIntyre set his sights on the final Shield member, Seth Rollins, and threw down the gauntlet for a “fight” with The Big Dog at WrestleMania. Find out how Universal Champion Brock Lesnar played an unexpected role in the outcome of this chaotic main event.

In a barbaric Last Man Standing Match main event, Drew McIntyre took Dean Ambrose to the limit and sent a message to Roman Reigns, who accepted The Scottish Psychopath’s WrestleMania challenge. But will The Big Dog suffer the same fate as The Lunatic Fringe when he squares off against McIntyre on The Grandest Stage of Them All?

After defeating The Riott Squad, Raw Women’s Champion Ronda Rousey, SmackDown Women’s Champion Charlotte Flair and Becky Lynch threw down in a chaotic brawl that only intensified after all three Superstars were handcuffed. How will the arrest of these The Baddest Woman on the Planet, The Queen and The Man affect the Winner Take All main event of WrestleMania this Sunday?

On a night The Undertaker returned to silence Elias, Lars Sullivan emerged to maul Kurt Angle, and the Raw Tag Team Titles and the Intercontinental Championship were defended, Universal Champion Seth Rollins and Kofi Kingston collided in a Winner Take All Match to close out the Raw after WrestleMania 35. That main event was spoiled, however, when The Bar intervened, transforming the bout into a tag team frenzy.

AJ Styles was Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins’ mystery partner as the Shield brothers squared off against Bobby Lashley, Drew McIntyre and Baron Corbin in a blistering six-man main event. Find out which other surprise competitors joined Team Red during the 2019 Superstar Shake-up.

After winning their respective Triple Threat Matches on Raw, AJ Styles and Baron Corbin clashed in a brutal main event for the right to challenge Seth Rollins for his Universal Championship at WWE Money in the Bank. Will The Phenomenal One take down The Beastslayer when they clash for the very first time on May 19? And the wrestling man does a punch!

AJ Styles crossed the line during the contract signing for his Universal Championship Match against Seth Rollins at WWE Money in the Bank when he laid hands on The Beastslayer’s prize and then on Rollins himself. Get all the details on the intense edition of Raw that ended with Rollins crashing through a table.

With Mr. McMahon’s “Wild Card Rule” allowing a limited number of Superstars to cross brands for a night, Raw was host to a WrestleMania rematch when SmackDown LIVE’s Kofi Kingston defended his hard-earned WWE Championship against “The New” Daniel Bryan. Did Bryan cause Kingston’s 11-year journey to the WWE Title to end in heartbreak? Also on Raw, Universal Champion Seth Rollins teamed with AJ Styles in an impromptu tag team match, Ricochet put his Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match opportunity on the line and much more!

After stuffing Sami Zayn in a dumpster that was carted away by a garbage truck, Braun Strowman was forced to defend his Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match opportunity against the bitter Superstar in a Falls Count Anywhere Match. Find out how some surprise assists gave Zayn an unexpected advantage in this brutal contest waged throughout London’s O2 Arena.

Universal Champion Seth Rollins joined forces with WWE Champion Kofi Kingston in what would become a No Disqualification Match against Baron Corbin & Bobby Lashley. How did the champions fare in this brutal main event, watched closely by “Mr. Money in the Bank” Brock Lesnar?

After learning he has nearly an entire year to cash in his Money in the Bank contract, Brock Lesnar chose to take his time when it comes to Universal Champion Seth Rollins and WWE Champion Kofi Kingston. With “The Purveyor of Paranoia” taking up residence in his psyche, The Beastslayer squared off against “The Critic of the Critics” Sami Zayn in a stunning Raw main event.

Mere days before facing Goldberg at WWE Super ShowDown for the first time ever, The Undertaker rose from the grave to address his forthcoming battle with the WWE Hall of Famer. Plus, find out how “Mr. Money in the Bank” Brock Lesnar made Universal Champion Seth Rollins suffer without cashing in his contract.

When Sami Zayn got overzealous as the “impartial” outside official in Raw’s main event pitting Universal Champion Seth Rollins against Kevin Owens, The Beastslayer unleashed on “The Critic of the Critics” and sent a painful message to his WWE Stomping Grounds challenger, Baron Corbin. Will The Lone Wolf suffer the same fate as Zayn on Sunday, June 23?

After Universal Champion Seth Rollins scored a victory over SmackDown Tag Team Champion Daniel Bryan in Raw’s chaotic main event, Baron Corbin repaid The Beastslayer for his steel chair rampage with a steel-bending barrage of his own that concluded with End of Days in the middle of the ring. Will the WWE Universe witness a similar sight this Sunday at WWE Stomping Grounds, where a Special Guest Referee of Corbin’s choosing will be waiting?

On a night of three blockbuster main events, including WWE Champion Kofi Kingston vs. Sami Zayn (and then Kevin Owens), and Roman Reigns vs. Shane McMahon & Drew McIntyre in a 2-on-1 Handicap Match, United States Champion Ricochet continued to capture the WWE Universe’s imagination when he clashed with AJ Styles in the final bout of the evening. However, The Phenomenal One, who had been out of action with an injury, was ready for the electrifying aerialist.

Braun Strowman and Bobby Lashley kicked off Raw with a Falls Count Anywhere Match, which came to a shocking conclusion when The Monster Among Men drove The All Mighty through the LED wall at the top of the entrance ramp. What’s next for Strowman and Lashley following this career-threatening incident? Also on Raw, The Undertaker confronted Shane McMahon and Drew McIntyre and AJ Styles re-formed The Club with Luke Gallows & Karl Anderson after a brutal U.S. Title Match against Ricochet.

By choosing Gary “The GOAT” Garbutt as Roman Reigns’ tag team partner, Shane McMahon and Drew McIntyre seemed to all but guarantee themselves a victory over The Big Dog just six nights before they face Reigns and The Undertaker in tag team action at WWE Extreme Rules. However, Reigns’ partner was more than he seemed. Find out how the former Universal Champion and a masked ally made a statement against “The Best in the World” and The Scottish Psychopath.

Superstars from Raw and SmackDown LIVE locked up in a Cross-Branded All-Star Top 10 Battle Royal for the opportunity to face Brock Lesnar for the Universal Championship at SummerSlam. Who will stand across from The Beast Incarnate at The Biggest Event of the Summer?

On an action-packed Raw Reunion, some of the greatest Superstars in WWE history returned to Monday Night Raw for a three-hour celebration, including "Stone Cold" Steve Austin, Hulk Hogan, "The Nature Boy" Ric Flair, D-Generation X, The Kliq, Torrie Wilson, Kelly Kelly, Melina Candice Michelle and so many others.

A “Samoan Summit” between Roman Reigns and Samoa Joe never even got started, as The Big Dog and The Samoan Submission Machine sparked a wild brawl that ultimately involved Drew McIntyre, Cedric Alexander, The Usos and new Raw Tag Team Champions Luke Gallows & Karl Anderson of The O.C. Find out which Superstars stood tall as Raw went off the air.

Thanks to a ruse by The Miz during Raw’s contract signing, Dolph Ziggler unwittingly agreed to a SummerSlam match with imposing WWE Hall of Famer Goldberg! Is The Showoff ready to go one-on-one with one of the most unstoppable competitors in sports-entertainment history? Also on Raw, Roman Reigns was nearly injured in an attempted automotive attack, and new WWE Women’s Tag Team Champions were crowned.

AJ Styles, Luke Gallows & Karl Anderson are running roughshod over the red brand, but they’ve made a massive enemy in the form of Braun Strowman, who joined Ricochet in helping Seth Rollins repel a 3-on-1 attack from the United States Champion and the Raw Tag Team Champions. Find out what The Monster Among Men’s assist could mean for next week’s Raw, and learn which Superstar returned to WWE for the first time since WrestleMania.

Despite Braun Strowman’s clear intentions towards Seth Rollins’ Universal Title, The Monster Among Men teamed up with The Beastslayer to challenge Luke Gallows & Karl Anderson of The O.C. for their Raw Tag Team Championship. Could the unusual alliance knock off The Good Brothers to snare the red brand’s tandem title? Also on Raw, two Superstars advanced in the King of the Ring tournament, and The Fiend claimed another victim.

Braun Strowman lashed out on The O.C. following his disqualification against United States Champion A.J. Styles.  Earlier, Sasha Banks continued her rampage vs. Natalya in her first match since Wrestlemania.
Following the first-ever Women's Champions Showcase, SmackDown Women's Champion Bayley sided with long-time friend Sasha Banks and shockingly attacked Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch.

After Cedric Alexander pinned United States Champion AJ Styles in the final moments of a truly chaotic 10-Man Tag Team Match, "Stone Cold" Steve Austin celebrated with the winning team of Seth Rollins, Braun Strowman, The Viking Raiders and Alexander. Earlier, Charlotte Flair sealed a win for her and Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch in a battle of the Four Horsewomen and Baron Corbin booked a trip to the final match of the King of the Ring tournament.
Things took a dark turn when both The Demon Kane and The Fiend emerged after Universal Champion Seth Rollins clashed with Raw Tag Team Champion Robert Roode.
"The Fiend" came calling again, Rey Mysterio defies the odds to secure massive title match on Raw's season premiere, a new 24/7 Champion is crowned and more.
"The Fiend" Bray Wyatt strikes again, Brock Lesnar brutally ambushes Rey Mysterio and his son, Hulk Hogan and Ric Flair announce major match for WWE Crown Jewel and more on the Raw season premiere.
WWE Security and Superstars had to break up a battle of behemoths, Rusev snapped and more on the final Raw before the WWE Draft starts on Friday Night SmackDown.
Universal Champion Seth Rollins burned down the Firefly Fun House, new Raw Tag Team Champions were crowned, and the WWE landscape changed dramatically following the second night of the WWE Draft.
The Street Profits score in Raw debut, Cain Velasquez comes to the aid of Rey Mysterio, new 24/7 Champion crowned and more.
Raw ends in agonizing fashion for Rusev after Lana's shocking claims about their marriage. And with Crown Jewel just days away, The Viper sends a painful message to Team Hogan.

After NXT declared war against Friday Night SmackDown, the black-and-gold brand brought the fight to Monday Night Raw, where Seth Rollins challenged Adam Cole for the NXT Championship. The instant classic was interrupted, however, when The Undisputed ERA attacked The Architect, leading to an all-out brawl between the brands just three weeks before Survivor Series. Also on Raw, Rey Mysterio challenged Brock Lesnar to a WWE Championship Match, and Raw Women’s Champion Becky Lynch met NXT Women’s Champion Shayna Baszler face-to-face.
The Five-Man Raw team for Survivor Series takes shape, Lana claims she is pregnant, Flash Morgan Webster & Mark Andrews make Raw debut and more.

Seth Rollins wagered his Survivor Series captaincy against Andrade, Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch teamed up with longtime rival Charlotte Flair, and Raw ended in an all-out brawl between all three brands.
AOP crash the main event, Rey Mysterio captures U.S. Championship, Asuka again blasts Charlotte Flair with green mist and more.
Randy Orton strikes from out of nowhere, Lana and Bobby Lashley are arrested, and R-Truth loses then regains the 24/7 Title from NASCAR Champion Kyle Busch.
Lana and Rusev's divorce leads to chaos, Seth Rollins joins forces with The AOP, The Viper comes calling and more just days before WWE TLC.
Lana and Bobby Lashley got engaged, Seth Rollins and AOP brutalized Rey Mysterio, and The Viking Raiders tried to help The Viper against The O.C.
The Viper teams with The Viking Raiders to battle The O.C., while Seth Rollins and AOP lay waste to Rey Mysterio and Samoa Joe.
On the final Raw of 2019, Lana and Bobby Lashley's wedding was left in ruin following the shocking confession from returning Liv Morgan and the cake surprise from Rusev!
The World's Largest Athlete and WWE Champion Brock Lesnar returned, multiple Superstars declared for the Royal Rumble Match and more on the first Raw of 2020.
The Monday Night Messiah finds a new disciple during the Fist Fight, Mojo Rawley captures 24/7 Title and more as Royal Rumble approaches.
Liv Morgan & Rusev clash with Lana & Bobby Lashley, Seth Rollins & Buddy Murphy crowned Raw Tag Team Champions and more as Royal Rumble approaches.

The Rated-R Superstar’s incredible Raw reemergence was quickly and savagely destroyed by Randy Orton’s brutal sneak attack. Plus, three title matches lit up Monday night, and Drew McIntyre revealed that he will challenge WWE Champion Brock Lesnar at WrestleMania.
WWE Champion Brock Lesnar comes calling, Angel Garza debuts against Rey Mysterio, Rhea Ripley wants Charlotte at WrestleMania and more.
Samoa Joe returns to action, Shayna Baszler bites Becky Lynch, Drew McIntyre joins MVP’s VIP Lounge and more.
The Monday Night Messiah lays out his plans for the future, Randy Orton obliterates Matt Hardy, Drew McIntyre crushes MVP and more.
As WWE Super ShowDown looms, chaos reigns during the Women’s Elimination Chamber Match contract signing, while the night’s main event ends in controversy.
The Viper assaults Edge’s wife, The Street Profits capture Raw Tag Team Titles, Drew McIntyre obliterates Brock Lesnar and more.
KO can’t thwart The Monday Night Messiah, Edge goes berserk on Randy Orton and MVP, and AJ Styles crosses into very dangerous territory with The Undertaker.

The Texas Rattlesnake raised hell, Edge challenged Randy Orton to a Last Man Standing Match at WrestleMania and The Undertaker and AJ Styles signed the contract for a match on The Grandest Stage of Them All.

The Viper accepted The Ultimate Opportunist’s WrestleMania challenge, AJ Styles challenged The Undertaker to a “Boneyard Match,” Becky Lynch took out Shayna Baszler in a brutal sneak attack and more as The Road to WrestleMania heats up.

The last Raw before WrestleMania 36 – The ONLY WrestleMania Too Big for Just One Night – features WWE Champion Brock Lesnar, Raw Women’s Champion Becky Lynch, WWE Hall of Famer Edge and The Undertaker. The Superstars of Raw make their final statements before a historic two-night WrestleMania.

The Raw after a historic WrestleMania 36 features big surprises. See footage from an impromptu match between new WWE Champion Drew McIntyre and Big Show after The Showcase of the Immortals went off the air. Plus, some new and returning Superstars make their mark on the red brand.

WWE Champion Drew McIntyre and Raw Women’s Champion Becky Lynch are both in the building following their WrestleMania 36 victories. Three spots in the Women’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match are up for grabs as Asuka battles Ruby Riott, Sarah Logan faces Shayna Baszler and Kairi Sane clashes with Nia Jax in Qualifying Matches.

Drew McIntyre, Sheamus & Keith Lee collide with AJ Styles, The Miz & John Morrison in a Six-Man Holiday Street Fight. Randy Orton's fiery fight with The Fiend at WWE TLC paves the way for "Alexa's Playground." New WWE Women’s Tag Team Champions Charlotte Flair & Asuka celebrate their WWE TLC victory.

Alexa Bliss tempts Randy Orton with a sadistic opportunity. Keith Lee faces Sheamus with the winner earning a WWE Title opportunity. Charlotte Flair collides with Nia Jax. Ricochet's rivalry with RETRIBUTION continues when he battles Mustafa Ali.

Raw celebrates Legends Night as WWE Hall of Famers and Legends like Hulk Hogan, Ric Flair, Torrie Wilson and Big Show ring in the new year. Drew McIntyre defends the WWE Title against Keith Lee. A legendary former WWE Champion returns to lay down a Royal Rumble challenge. Randy Orton attempts to live up to his Legend Killer persona.

Triple H returns to Raw only to be met with aggression from a familiar face. WWE Champion Drew McIntyre responds to Goldberg’s challenge. Flair family drama leads to a showdown between Charlotte Flair and Lacey Evans. United States Champion Bobby Lashley battles Riddle.

Raw Women's Champion Asuka steps inside "Alexa's Playground" before battling Alexa Bliss in a non-title match. Randy Orton's twisted rivalry with The Fiend and Bliss continues as a disfigured Viper delivers a fiery message. The Dirt Sheet welcomes Gillberg and a phony "Drew McIntyre." Ricochet goes head-to-head with AJ Styles.

WWE Champion Drew McIntyre and Goldberg come face to face before they battle at Royal Rumble. Alexa Bliss' dark and twisted journey continues when she challenges Asuka for the Raw Women's Title. Riddle takes on The Hurt Business in a Gauntlet Match with a United States Title opportunity on the line. Charlotte Flair clashes with Shayna Baszler.

Raw is on The Road to WrestleMania. Royal Rumble fallout includes new challengers and familiar foes. The Miz welcomes multi-platinum recording artist Bad Bunny to "Miz TV." Bobby Lashley defends his United States Title against Riddle. The Lucha House Party challenge Cedric Alexander & Shelton Benjamin for the Raw Tag Team Titles.

Drew McIntyre rekindles his rivalry with Randy Orton in a non-title match and addresses Sheamus' betrayal. After weeks of Lacey Evans and Ric Flair tormenting Charlotte Flair, The Queen and The Sassy Southern Belle come face-to-face.

A Gauntlet Match determines the final entrant in the WWE Championship Elimination Chamber Match, and a new challenger emerges for the career-altering contest. WWE Champion Drew McIntyre joins "Miz TV." Charlotte Flair & Asuka's match against Lacey Evans & Peyton Royce leads to a shocking announcement.

After cashing in his Money in the Bank Contract and becoming WWE Champion at WWE Elimination Chamber, The Miz presents a special Championship celebration episode of "Miz TV." New United States Champion Riddle faces John Morrison in a non-title match. Sheamus goes head-to-head with Jeff Hardy.
The Miz defends the WWE Championship against Bobby Lashley. Drew McIntyre returns to Raw for the first time since losing the WWE Title.

The Miz attempts to win back the WWE Championship when he challenges Bobby Lashley for the title. Braun Strowman demands an apology from Shane McMahon after being disrespected by Shane-O-Mac. WWE Women's Tag Team Champions Nia Jax & Shayna Baszler defend their titles against Naomi & Lana.

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley's All Mighty Era begins. Riddle battles Mustafa Ali for the United States Championship. The Hurt Business defend the Raw Tag Team Championship against The New Day. Asuka returns to the ring seeking payback against Shayna Baszler.

Randy Orton summons The Fiend after his adversary's horrifying return at WWE Fastlane. A new challenger emerges for Raw Women's Champion Asuka. WWE Champion Bobby Lashley collides with Sheamus in a non-title match. Kofi Kingston goes one-on-one with AJ Styles. Jeff Hardy battles The Miz.

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley offers a title opportunity at WrestleMania to anyone who can take down Drew McIntyre before The Show of Shows. Raw Women's Champion Asuka and Rhea Ripley make their WrestleMania showdown official with a contract signing. United States Champion Riddle looks for payback against Sheamus in a non-title match.
Drew McIntyre battles King Corbin, and Bobby Lashley takes on Cedric Alexander just days ahead of their WWE Title Match at WrestleMania.

After an epic two-night WrestleMania, the most unpredictable Raw of the year brings Superstar returns and surprises. Multiple challengers come forward for Bobby Lashley's WWE Championship. New Raw Women's Champion Rhea Ripley faces Asuka in a WrestleMania rematch.
Asuka looks for payback against Charlotte Flair. Drew McIntyre demands answers from MVP after being attacked by MACE & T-BAR. The Miz & Maryse host a Miz & Mrs. celebration on "Miz TV."

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley returns. Drew McIntyre & Braun Strowman take on MACE & T-BAR. Sonya Deville uses her power to make a surprising decision. Asuka, Naomi & Lana battle Rhea Ripley, Nia Jax & Shayna Baszler. Damian Priest joins forces with The New Day against The Miz, Elias & Jaxson Ryker.

RAW #1458

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley collides with Braun Strowman. Raw Tag Team Champions AJ Styles & Omos defend their titles against New Day. Nia Jax & Shayna Baszler put the WWE Women’s Tag Team Titles on the line against Lana & Naomi.

RAW #1459

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley battles Drew McIntyre in a WrestleMania rematch. Former WWE Champion Jinder Mahal makes his return to Raw. The New Day & R-K-Bro join forces to take on AJ Styles, Omos, Jaxson Ryder & Elias. Asuka, Mandy Rose & Dana Brooke face Charlotte Flair, Shayna Baszler & Nia Jax.

RAW #1460

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley issues an open challenge to anyone other than Drew McIntyre and Braun Strowman. New WWE Women's Tag Team Champions Natalya & Tamina venture into Alexa’s Playground before defending their titles against Shayna Baszler & Nia Jax. Asuka takes on Charlotte Flair. Damian Priest battles John Morrison in a Lumberjack Match.

RAW #1461

WWE Women's Tag Team Champions Natalya & Tamina defend their titles against Shayna Baszler & Nia Jax. Kofi Kingston and Drew McIntyre clash to determine the next challenger to WWE Champion Bobby Lashley. Xavier Woods and Riddle settle their differences in a head-to-head battle.

RAW #1462

Drew McIntyre and Kofi Kingston battle in a rematch to determine the challenger to WWE Champion Bobby Lashley. AJ Styles & Omos take on Elias & Jaxson Ryker in a Raw Tag Team Title Match. Raw Women’s Champion Rhea Ripley and her WWE Hell in a Cell opponent Charlotte Flair join “Miz TV.” Reginald faces Shayna Baszler.

RAW #1463

Bobby Lashley and Drew McIntyre sign their WWE Championship Match contract ahead of WWE Hell in a Cell. Shayna Baszler stops by "Alexa's Playground." A Tag Team Battle Royal determines the next challengers to AJ Styles & Omos’ Raw Tag Team Titles.

RAW #1464

Drew McIntyre takes on AJ Styles with WWE Hell in a Cell on the horizon. Eva Marie makes her highly-anticipated return to Raw. RK-Bro and The New Day settle their differences in tag team action.

RAW #1465

The Hell in a Cell Match returns to Raw for the first time in over 20 years as WWE Champion Bobby Lashley steps inside the unforgiving steel structure for the second night in a row. The road to WWE Money in the Bank begins as Raw Superstars battle in Money in the Bank Qualifying Matches.

RAW #1466

A Last Chance Money in the Bank Qualifying Match gets a last-minute change. Kofi Kingston comes face-to-face with MVP after Bobby Lashley's vicious attack on Xavier Woods. Rhea Ripley, Mandy Rose & Dana Brooke battle Charlotte Flair, Natalya & Tamina in a Six-Woman Tag Team Match. Jaxson Ryker takes on Elias in a Strap Match.

RAW #1467

The New Day battle Bobby Lashley & MVP in tag team action. The Miz hosts a special Money in the Bank edition of "Miz TV." Charlotte Flair provides a medical update after being attacked by Rhea Ripley. Ricochet and John Morrison clash in a Raw rematch.

RAW #1468

Xavier Woods goes head-to-head with Bobby Lashley. MVP throws the WWE Champion a celebration on The VIP Lounge. Ricochet and John Morrison collide in a Falls Count Anywhere Match. Alexa Bliss, Asuka, Naomi and Nikki A.S.H. battle in a Fatal 4-Way Match. United States Champion Sheamus clashes with Humberto Carrillo.

John Cena returns to Raw after his surprise appearance at WWE Money in the Bank. Keith Lee answers WWE Champion Bobby Lashley's open challenge. WWE Hall of Famer Goldberg arrives with a challenge of his own. Nikki A.S.H. cashes in her Money in the Bank contract.

Nikki A.S.H.'s Raw Women's Title reign gets off to a rocky start thanks to Charlotte Flair. WWE Champion Bobby Lashley lets his actions do the talking in response to Goldberg. Raw Tag Team Champions AJ Styles & Omos defend their titles against The Viking Raiders.

RAW #1471

Raw Women's Champion Nikki A.S.H. battles Charlotte Flair in a No Holds Barred Match. Goldberg confronts WWE Champion Bobby Lashley. Riddle collides with the colossal Omos.

RAW #1472

Randy Orton returns to Raw, much to the delight of his RK-Bro partner Riddle. WWE Champion Bobby Lashley addresses his upcoming title showdown against Goldberg. Raw Women's Champion Nikki A.S.H. battles Rhea Ripley to build momentum for SummerSlam, but Charlotte Flair has other plans. NXT Champion Karrion Kross gets a rematch against Jeff Hardy.

RAW #1473

Goldberg sends a message to WWE Champion Bobby Lashley ahead of their title showdown. Raw Women's Champion Nikki A.S.H. attempts to fend off Rhea Ripley and Charlotte Flair. Drew McIntyre faces Veer & Shanky in a Handicap Match with SummerSlam implications. Riddle earns Randy Orton's respect.

RAW #1474

WWE Champion Bobby Lashley and MVP address their actions at SummerSlam. Randy Orton & Riddle's RK-Bro Championship Celebration is interrupted by AJ Styles & Omos. The Miz & John Morrison's partnership implodes after Logan Paul's appearance on "Moist TV." Rhea Ripley & Nikki A.S.H. square off against Nia Jax & Shayna Baszler.

RAW #1475

RK-Bro put their Raw Tag Team Titles on the line against WWE Champion Bobby Lashley & MVP. Damian Priest's United States Title Open Championship Challenge produces not one, but two challengers. Nia Jax makes an impactful statement against Charlotte Flair. The Miz runs from John Morrison.

RAW #1476

A tag team turmoil match takes place to determine the number one contenders to RK-Bro's Tag Team Championship. Charlotte and Nia Jax have a rematch after Nia got the best of Charlotte last week. The unusual duo of Rhea Ripley and Nikki A.S.H take on the Women's Tag Champions Natalya and Tamina in a non-title match.

RAW #1477

Big E promises to cash in his Money in the Bank briefcase. Shayna Baszler looks to prove herself against the Women's Champion Charlotte. After their tag bout last week, Nikki A.S.H takes on Tamina and Rhea Ripley takes on Natalya in singles competition. Doudrop continues to fight back against Eva Marie's abuse.

RAW #1478

Head of the Table Roman Reigns with the rest of The Bloodline make an appearance on Monday Night Raw. The New Day celebrate newly-crowned WWE Champion Big E. Doudrop continues to exact her revenge on Eva Marie. Randy Orton and AJ Styles put on another masterclass in wrestling. After earning their title match two weeks ago, Nikki A.S.H and Rhea Ripley compete for the Women's Tag Championship. Charlotte participates in Alexa's Playground.

RAW #1479

Chaos surrounding Big E and Bobby Lashley's WWE Championship Match moves their massive showdown inside a steel cage. Goldberg delivers a menacing message. Damian Priest defends the United States Championship against Sheamus in an extreme battle. Doudrop answers Charlotte Flair's Raw Women's Championship Open Challenge.

RAW #1480

Raw and SmackDown make their selections on Night Two of the 2021 WWE Draft. Becky Lynch returns to Raw, instigating a huge main event showdown between Charlotte Flair and Bianca Belair. WWE Hall of Famer Goldberg comes looking for Bobby Lashley.

RAW #1481

WWE Champion Big E and his WWE Crown Jewel challenger Drew McIntyre attempt to join forces. Raw Women’s Champion Charlotte Flair & SmackDown Women’s Champion Becky Lynch battle Bianca Belair & Sasha Banks. The 2021 King of the Ring and Queen's Crown Tournaments continue.

RAW #1482

Charlotte Flair defends the Raw Women's Championship against Bianca Belair. The King of the Ring and Queen's Crown Tournaments continue with semifinal showdowns. WWE Champion Big E unites with his WWE Crown Jewel challenger Drew McIntyre to take on The Dirty Dawgs. Raw Tag Team Champions RK-Bro battle The Street Profits.

RAW #1483

A new era of Raw begins with multiple Superstars vying for the chance to challenge WWE Champion Big E. Queen Zelina revels in her coronation as the first-ever Queen’s Crown Tournament Champion. Bianca Belair delivers a painful statement to Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch. RK-Bro defend the Raw Tag Team Championship.

RAW #1484

Becky Lynch defends the Raw Women's Championship against Bianca Belair. Big E collides with Kevin Owens for the first time ever. United States Champion Damian Priest takes on T-BAR in a No Disqualification Match. Rey Mysterio faces Austin Theory.

RAW #1485

Kevin Owens collides with Seth Rollins. Several Superstars protest Raw’s Survivor Series team selections. Bianca Belair, Rhea Ripley, Liv Morgan, Carmella and Queen Zelina vie for an opportunity to challenge for Becky Lynch’s Raw Women’s Championship.

RAW #1486

Several Superstars insert themselves into the middle of WWE Champion Big E's conflict with Kevin Owens. Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch responds to SmackDown Women's Champion Charlotte Flair. Rey Mysterio battles Bobby Lashley.

RAW #1487

The search is on for the person that stole Mr. McMahon's precious Cleopatra’s Egg. Following an explosive Survivor Series event, Raw's champions focus their attention back on their challengers. Rey Mysterio and his son Dominik look for payback against Bobby Lashley in a 2-on-1 Handicap Match.

RAW #1488

WWE Champion Big E battles Kevin Owens. Edge makes his return to Raw. Becky Lynch and Liv Morgan sign their Raw Women's Title Match contract. Finn Bálor looks for payback against Seth Rollins. Raw Tag Team Champions RK-Bro take on The Dirty Dawgs.

RAW #1489

Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch defends her title against Liv Morgan. WWE Champion Big E collides with Kevin Owens inside a steel cage. The Miz hosts Edge on "Miz TV." The RK-Bro-nament to determine the next challengers to RK-Bro’s Raw Tag Team Title begins.

RAW #1490

Bobby Lashley looks to turn his recent domination into a WWE Championship opportunity. Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch's heated rivalry with Liv Morgan escalates. Edge and The Miz mix it up ahead of their match at Day 1.

RAW #1491

Big E, Bobby Lashley, Kevin Owens and Seth Rollins continue their conflict ahead of Day 1. Edge hosts The Miz and Maryse on "The Cutting Edge," while The A-Lister hosts AJ Styles & Omos on "Miz TV." Finn Bálor battles Austin Theory. Damian Priest takes on Dolph Ziggler in a Championship Contender’s Match.

RAW #1492

The Miz and Maryse renew their wedding vows with the help of a special surprise officiant. Dolph Ziggler challenges Damian Priest for the United States Championship. The Street Profits face Rey & Dominick Mysterio in the RK-Bro-nament Finals.

New WWE Champion Brock Lesnar addresses his Day 1 triumph. Big E, Seth Rollins, Kevin Owens and Bobby Lashley collide for a WWE Title opportunity. Damian Priest defends the United States Championship against Dolph Ziggler. AJ Styles clashes with former tag team partner Omos.

Bianca Belair, Liv Morgan and Doudrop battle in a Triple Threat Match to determine the next challenger to Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch. RK-Bro defend the Raw Tag Team Championship against Alpha Academy. WWE Champion Brock Lesnar comes face-to-face with his Royal Rumble challenger Bobby Lashley.

Bobby Lashley battles Seth "Freakin" Rollins. Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch joins forces with her Royal Rumble challenger Doudrop to take on Liv Morgan & Bianca Belair. The Alpha Academy kick off their Raw Tag Team Championship reign with a graduation ceremony.

WWE Champion Brock Lesnar and his challenger Bobby Lashley meet inside the ring for a Royal Rumble weigh-in. The Miz throws a birthday extravaganza for Maryse. Raw Tag Team Champions Alpha Academy and RK-Bro do battle in an Academic Challenge.

Raw's Road to WrestleMania begins. Royal Rumble Match winner Ronda Rousey returns to the red brand for the first time in nearly three years. Royal Rumble Match winner Brock Lesnar chooses his WrestleMania 38 opponent. New WWE Champion Bobby Lashley once again ushers in The All Mighty Era.

Riddle battles Seth "Freakin" Rollins. RK-Bro face Alpha Academy in a Quiz Bowl in the final round of their Academic Challenge. WWE Hall of Famer Lita makes a statement ahead of her Raw Women's Championship clash against Becky Lynch.

Becky Lynch and Lita sign their Raw Women's Title Match contract. Brock Lesnar addresses the WWE Universe ahead of WWE Elimination Chamber. Women's Elimination Chamber Match participants compete in a high-stakes Gauntlet Match. Riddle throws an RK-Broga Party. AJ Styles collides with Damian Priest for the United States Title.

New WWE Champion Brock Lesnar's celebration gets cut short. The Miz brings a global megastar into his rivalry with Rey & Dominick Mysterio. Seth "Freakin" Rollins & Kevin Owens face RK-Bro in a high-stakes showdown.
