WWE Hall of Famer Edge looks for a Superstar to answer his open challenge at WrestleMania. Damian Priest battles Finn Bálor for the United States Championship. Bianca Belair, Rhea Ripley & Liv Morgan join forces to take on Raw Women's Champion Becky Lynch, Doudrop & Nikki A.S.H.

Alpha Academy defend the Raw Tag Team Championship in a Triple Threat Match against RK-Bro and Kevin Owens & Seth Rollins. Owens extends a WrestleMania invite to a WWE Hall of Famer. Logan Paul returns to throw a homecoming celebration with The Miz. Edge explains his vicious attack on AJ Styles.
WWE remembers WWE Hall of Famer Scott Hall. Kevin Owens responds to “Stone Cold” Steve Austin accepting his invitation for WrestleMania and RK-Bro throws a Championship Celebration.
Becky Lynch addresses her brutal attack on Bianca Belair, while RK-Bro takes on Alpha Academy, and Finn Bálor looks for retribution on Austin Theory. Plus, AJ Styles returns to Raw.

WWE Champion Brock Lesnar and Universal Champion Roman Reigns make their final statements ahead of The Biggest WrestleMania Match of All Time. Raw and SmackDown Tag Team Champions collide as RK-Bro face The Usos. The four tag teams set to battle for the Women's Tag Team Championship at WrestleMania clash in a huge Eight-Woman Tag Team Match.
A new Undisputed WWE Universal Champion, Cody Rhodes' return to Monday nights and Veer's highly-anticipated arrival to the red brand highlights the Raw after WrestleMania.

Cody Rhodes battles The Miz in his first match on Raw in six years. AJ Styles looks for payback when he clashes with Damian Priest. RK-Bro face Alpha Academy. Omos & MVP address their attack on Bobby Lashley on "The VIP Lounge."

Theory challenges Finn Bálor for the United States Championship. WWE Women's Tag Team Champions Sasha Banks & Naomi battle Rhea Ripley & Liv Morgan. R-Truth officiates a Double Commitment Ceremony between Dana Brooke & Reggie and Tamina & Akira Tozawa.

WWE celebrates the 20th anniversary of Randy Orton's debut. Bianca Belair defends the Raw Women's Championship against Sonya Deville. Becky Lynch returns for the first time since WrestleMania and is met by another returning Superstar. Bobby Lashley and Omos lock up in a mammoth arm-wrestling contest.

The Bloodline come to Raw with WrestleMania Backlash less than a week away. Bianca Belair, Liv Morgan & Asuka battle Becky Lynch, Rhea Ripley & Sonya Deville in a Six-Woman Tag Team Match. AJ Styles faces Damian Priest in a high-stakes showdown. Seth "Freakin" Rollins hosts his own appreciation night.
Asuka faces Raw Women's Champion Bianca Belair in a Championship Contender's Match. Cody Rhodes challenges Theory for the United States Championship. The Judgment Day welcome their newest member.

Bobby Lashley collides with Omos in a massive Steel Cage Match. A new challenger earns herself a match against Raw Women's Champion Bianca Belair at WWE Hell in a Cell. Lacey Evans addresses the WWE Universe.

Becky Lynch addresses her loss to Asuka. Bobby Lashley issues an All Mighty challenge for Omos & MVP. Cody Rhodes battles The Miz. Veer Mahaan joins a special edition of Jerry "The King" Lawler's "King's Court."

Bianca Belair faces Asuka. Cody Rhodes addresses Seth "Freakin" Rollins. Riddle & Shinsuke Nakamura battle The Usos in a Championship Contenders Match. Bobby Lashley, Omos and MVP sign the contract for their Handicap Match at WWE Hell in a Cell.

Alexa Bliss, Liv Morgan, Doudrop and Rhea Ripley battle in a high-stakes Fatal 4-Way Match. Cody Rhodes addresses the WWE Universe after his valiant win at WWE Hell in a Cell. The Judgment Day welcome a new member. The Miz and Maryse take to the ring for the premiere episode of “Miz TV.”

Bobby Lashley faces off with Theory in the Inaugural Theory Invitational Pose-Down. Seth "Freakin" Rollins responds to his attack on Cody Rhodes. Qualifying Matches continue for the Men's and Women's Money in the Bank Ladder Matches.

Elias returns to Raw to perform one more concert with his brother, Ezekiel. Becky Lynch battles Asuka in a Women's Money in the Bank Qualifying Match. Riddle faces Omos in a Men's Money in the Bank Qualifying Match.

John Cena returns to Raw to celebrate his 20-year anniversary with WWE. Superstars compete in a Last Chance Battle Royal for a spot in the Men's Money in the Bank Ladder Match. Six women battle it out to qualify for the Women's Money in the Bank Ladder Match.

Asuka and Becky Lynch battle in a No Holds Barred Match. New SmackDown Women's Champion Liv Morgan comes to Raw. The Miz responds to Logan Paul's SummerSlam challenge. The Mysterios take on The Judgment Day. Bobby Lashley & The Street Profits face Theory & Alpha Academy.
Brock Lesnar returns to Raw for the first time since WrestleMania 38. Carmella challenges Bianca Belair for the Raw Women's Championship. Rey Mysterio goes one-on-one with Finn Bálor.
Logan Paul comes to Raw looking for The Miz. Carmella challenges Bianca Belair for the Raw Women's Championship. Kevin Owens welcomes Riddle to “The KO Show.”

Rey Mysterio celebrates 20 years with WWE. Undisputed WWE Universal Champion Roman Reigns comes to Raw as The Bloodline clash with Riddle & The Street Profits in a huge Six-Man Tag Team Match. Logan Paul hosts “Impaulsive TV.”

The Raw after SummerSlam brings multiple returns and new title opportunities. The Mysterios challenge The Usos for the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship. Superstars compete for a chance to challenge for the United States Championship.
Ciampa challenges Bobby Lashley for the United States Championship. Rey Mysterio faces The Judgment Day’s Finn Bálor. Angelo Dawkins battles Seth "Freakin" Rollins.
AJ Styles challenges Bobby Lashley for the United States Championship. Riddle gives an update on his future. The WWE Women's Tag Team Championship Tournament continues.

A pair of WWE Hall of Famers return to their hometown of Toronto as Edge takes on The Judgment Day's Damian Priest, and Trish Stratus addresses the WWE Universe. Alexa Bliss & Asuka face Dakota Kai & IYO SKY in the semifinals of the WWE Women’s Tag Team Championship Tournament.

Raquel Rodriguez & Aliyah face Dakota Kai & IYO SKY to crown the new WWE Women’s Tag Team Champions. WWE Hall of Famer Kurt Angle returns to Raw. Matt Riddle and Seth "Freakin" Rollins sit down for an interview ahead of their battle at WWE Clash at the Castle.

The Miz challenges Bobby Lashley for the United States Championship inside a steel cage. Four tag teams battle to determine the new challengers to the WWE Undisputed Tag Team Championship. A monstrous former WWE Superstar returns.

Edge looks for payback when he faces The Judgment Day's newest disciple Dominik Mysterio. Johnny Gargano makes his in-ring return against Chad Gable. Dakota Kai & IYO SKY challenge Raquel Rodriguez & Aliyah for the WWE Women's Tag Team Championship.

Seth "Freakin" Rollins challenges Bobby Lashley for the United States Championship. The Miz calls out the enigmatic Dexter Lumis to explain himself on "Miz TV." Kevin Owens collides with Austin Theory.

Matt Riddle battles Damian Priest. AJ Styles collides with "Honorary Uce" Sami Zayn. Bianca Belair clashes with IYO SKY. Rey Mysterio faces Seth "Freakin" Rollins. Kevin Owens & Johnny Gargano team up to take on Alpha Academy.

Bianca Belair and Bayley sign their Raw Women's Championship Ladder Match contract. Rey Mysterio teams with AJ Styles against The Judgment Day. Matt Riddle and Seth "Freakin" Rollins come face-to-face before stepping Inside the Fight Pit. Candice LeRae faces Dakota Kai. Johnny Gargano battles Otis.

D-Generation X celebrate their 25-year anniversary. Undisputed WWE Universal Champion Roman Reigns and The Bloodline come to Raw. Bobby Lashley defends the United States Championship against Seth “Freakin” Rollins. Johnny Gargano faces Austin Theory.

Matt Riddle challenges Seth "Freakin" Rollins for the United States Championship. Elias makes his long-awaited return. Brock Lesnar comes to Raw on a collision course with Bobby Lashley. Dexter Lumis receives a Raw contract if he can defeat The Miz.

Raw Women's Champion Bianca Belair and Bayley continue their rivalry with a head-to-head showdown. The O.C.'s Karl Anderson clashes with The Judgment Day's Finn Bálor. Mustafa Ali battles Austin Theory. Johnny Gargano faces Baron Corbin.

Matt Riddle collides with Otis in a Trick or Street Fight on a special Halloween edition of Raw. Undisputed WWE Universal Champion Roman Reigns delivers one last message to Logan Paul ahead of WWE Crown Jewel. Bianca Belair faces Nikki Cross.

Seth "Freakin" Rollins holds a United States Championship Open Challenge. Backup arrives for The O.C. in their conflict against The Judgment Day. The New Day target The Usos ahead of their history-making showdown.

Seth “Freakin” Rollins faces Finn Bálor for the United States Title. The Miz's public apology on "Miz TV" goes awry thanks to Johnny Gargano and Dexter Lumis. Bianca Belair's WarGames team gets a new member. Matt Riddle collides with Chad Gable.

The battle lines are drawn on the final Raw before Survivor Series WarGames. Rhea Ripley and Asuka clash in a high-stakes WarGames Advantage Match. The conflict between United States Champion Seth "Freakin" Rollins, Bobby Lashley and Austin Theory escalates. Matt Riddle joins forces with Elias to take on Alpha Academy.

The conflict between rivals continues after an explosive Survivor Series WarGames. Dexter Lumis can earn a WWE contract if he defeats The Miz one-on-one. Becky Lynch addresses the WWE Universe. The Street Profits return to take on Alpha Academy.

Raw features two high-stakes Triple Threat Matches as Asuka, Bayley and Rhea Ripley collide, and Becky Lynch, Nikki Cross and Alexa Bliss clash. JBL hosts an invitational poker tournament. Matt Riddle & Elias challenge The Usos for the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship.

Alexa Bliss battles Bayley in a Raw Women's Championship No. 1 Contender's Match. Bobby Lashley collides with Seth "Freakin" Rollins in a United States Championship No. 1 Contender's Match. Candice LeRae faces Damage CTRL's Iyo Sky.

With a bundle of money hanging above the ring, Dexter Lumis and The Miz clash in a Winner Takes All Ladder Match. Becky Lynch battles Bayley. Former tag team partners reconnect to take on The Usos. The Street Profits face The Judgment Day's Finn Bálor and Damian Priest.
The final Raw of 2022 highlights the best matches and moments from an unforgettable year in a special episode.

The Bloodline look to make a statement on the first Raw of 2023. Raw Women's Champion Bianca Belair defends her title against Alexa Bliss. Seth "Freakin” Rollins challenges Austin Theory for the United States Championship.

Alexa Bliss continues down a dark road. Dominik Mysterio opens up about his time in prison on "Miz TV." New challengers to the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship emerge through Tag Team Turmoil. Kevin Owens brings the fight to The Bloodline.
Bobby Lashley was victorious in a Six-Way Elimination Match for a United States Title opportunity, The Judgment Day outlasted Alpha Academy, Bronson Reed made a statement debut and much more.

A historic episode of Raw celebrates 30 years of the Monday night staple with appearances by WWE Legends such as Hulk Hogan, Ric Flair, D-Generation X and Undertaker. The Bloodline put Sami Zayn on trial in Tribal Court. Bobby Lashley challenges Austin Theory for the United States Title. Becky Lynch collides with Bayley inside a steel cage.

In an explosive Raw main event, Royal Rumble winner Cody Rhodes took down Finn Bálor as The Rated-R Superstar and The Glamazon laid waste to Damian Priest, Dominik Mysterio and Rhea Ripley at ringside. Plus, Ripley declared she will face Charlotte Flair at WrestleMania, Rhodes geared up to challenge Undisputed WWE Universal Champion Roman Reigns at The Show of Shows, three Superstars qualified for the U.S. Title Elimination Chamber Match, and a Women’s Elimination Chamber Match was established to determine who will battle the Raw Women’s Champion.

Becky Lynch and Bayley finally clash inside a steel cage. Michin, Candice LeRae, Carmella and Piper Niven battle for the right to step into the Elimination Chamber. Angelo Dawkins takes on Damian Priest, and Montez Ford faces Elias in United States Title Elimination Chamber Qualifying Matches.

Brock Lesnar and Bobby Lashley meet in a massive encounter to sign their WWE Elimination Chamber contract. Elimination Chamber Match entrants clash in a Raw vs. SmackDown Six-Woman Tag Team Match when Asuka, Carmella & Nikki Cross battle Raquel Rodriguez, Liv Morgan & Natalya. Seth "Freakin" Rollins joins "Miz TV."

Sami Zayn addresses the WWE Universe after his emotional showdown against Roman Reigns at WWE Elimination Chamber. United States Champion Austin Theory defends his title against Edge. Bayley hosts “Ding Dong, Hello!” with Dakota Kai & IYO Sky. Seth "Freakin" Rollins clashes with The Miz.

On the ultra-turbulent Road to WrestleMania, WWE Hall of Famer Trish Stratus emerged to help The Man and Lita conquer IYO SKY & Dakota Kai and claim the WWE Women’s Tag Team Championships! Plus, Brock Lesnar agreed to battle Omos at The Show of Shows before taking out MVP with the F-5, Seth “Freakin” Rollins “borrowed” Miz’s phone to place a call and invite Logan Paul to meet him in the ring, and Bray Wyatt performed “The Muscle Man Dance” for Bobby Lashley.

Raw moves into overdrive on The Road to WrestleMania, as “Main Event” Jey Uso makes a shocking return to help The Bloodline’s Jimmy Uso and Solo Sikoa launch a vicious assault on the one-time “Honorary Uce.” Plus, three WrestleMania Matches are made official, including John Cena accepting United States Champion Austin Theory’s challenge with a scathing indictment on the mic. and so much more. Catch WWE action on Peacock, WWE Network, FOX, USA Network, Sony India and more.

Thanks to a surprise attack from The Usos, Solo Sikoa reigned supreme over Kevin Owens in a brutal Street Fight. Plus, Omos threw Brock Lesnar from the squared circle, Edge challenged Finn Bálor to a Hell in a Cell Match at WrestleMania and so much more.

Roman Reigns and Cody Rhodes come face-to-face, Bianca Belair and Asuka join forces, Rhea Ripley faces a challenge from Bayley, Kevin Owens & Sami Zayn unite against The Usos, Logan Paul brings IMPAULSIVE TV to Raw and much more.

On WrestleMania Raw, The American Nightmare overcame the undefeated Solo Sikoa before the biggest match of his career against Undisputed WWE Universal Champion Roman Reigns at WrestleMania, Omos dropped Brock Lesnar when their WrestleMania weigh-in descended into an all-out brawl, Sonya Deville & Chelsea Green overcame Michin & Candice LeRae to qualify for the WrestleMania Showcase and so much more.

On a tremendous Monday Night Raw, Brock Lesnar assaulted his would-be partner Cody Rhodes, absolutely decimating The American Nightmare! Plus, Damian Priest sent Bad Bunny though an announce table, Riddle made his stunning return, Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn beat The Street Profits, Raquel Rodriguez and Liv Morgan earned a WWE Women’s Tag Team Title Match and so much more!

In Raw’s turbulent main event, Sami Zayn and Matt Riddle arrived on Raw from a travel delay just in time to help Kevin Owens repel a 3-on-1 attack by The Usos and Solo Sikoa in a chaotic Raw main event showdown. Plus, Raquel Rodriguez & Liv Morgan captured the WWE Women's Tag Team Titles from Becky Lynch & WWE Hall of Famer Trish Stratus and Cody Rhodes challenged Brock Lesnar to a match at WWE Backlash.

On an incredible Monday Night Raw, Kevin Owens, Sami Zayn, Matt Riddle, The LWO, The Judgment Day and The Bloodline engaged in an all-out brawl after KO, Zayn and Riddle defeated The Judgment Day! Plus, Solo Sikoa dispatched Rey Mysterio, Trish Stratus explained her shocking betrayal of Lita and Becky Lynch, the match between Cody Rhodes and Brock Lesnar was made for WWE Backlash and so much more!

On a game-changing Monday Night Raw, Bad Bunny sought payback by attacking Damian Priest with a Kendo stick before challenging The Archer of Infamy to a San Juan Street Fight! Plus, Triple H revealed the World Heavyweight Championship, Cody Rhodes earned a win over Finn Bálor, and so much more!

Night Two of the 2023 WWE Draft got started with an early bang as SmackDown Women's Champion Rhea Ripley, United States Champion Austin Theory, Seth "Freakin" Rollins and Charlotte Flair were drafted during the First Round. Plus, Seth "Freakin" Rollins took on Solo Sikoa and Cody Rhodes, and Brock Lesnar needed security to keep them apart and so much more!

After battling through a brutal Triple Threat Match and a hard-hitting main event showdown against Finn Bálor, Seth “Freakin” Rollins became the first competitor who will battle for the World Heavyweight Title at WWE Night of Champions. Plus, Brock Lesnar laid waste to Cody Rhodes before challenging him to a rematch at Night of Champions and so much more.

On a momentous Monday Night Raw, Paul Heyman found a way to undermine Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn as Imperium helped The Judgment Day gain a victory over the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions. Plus, Cody Rhodes told Brock Lesnar to get out of his way, Becky Lynch challenged Trish Stratus to a match at WWE Night of Champions, Mustafa Ali earned an Intercontinental Title Match against Gunther and so much more!

On the final Raw before WWE Night of Champions, Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn joined forces with Matt Riddle to reign supreme over Intercontinental Champion Gunther, Ludwig Kaiser and Giovanni Vinci. Plus, Brock Lesnar injured Cody Rhodes in a pair of brutal attacks and so much more.

Just two days after they battled each other for title gold, the new World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins joined forces with AJ Styles to overcome Finn Bálor & Damian Priest of The Judgment Day. Plus, Ronda Rousey & Shayna Baszler emerged victorious in a Fatal 4-Way Match to capture the WWE Tag Team Titles, Cody Rhodes made an open challenge to Brock Lesnar and so much more.

Seth "Freakin" Rollins overcame a challenge from Damian Priest for the World Heavyweight Title, Becky Lynch and Zoey Stark punched their tickets to the Women's Money in the Bank Ladder Match, Dominik Mysterio crashed Cody Rhodes' appearance on "Miz TV," and more.

On a momentous Monday Night Raw, Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn defeated Intercontinental Champion Gunther and Ludwig Kaiser to retain their gold. Plus, Damian Priest became the final entrant in the Men’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match by defeating Matt Riddle, Finn Bálor challenged Seth “Freakin” Rollins for the World Heavyweight Title at WWE Money in the Bank, Rhea Ripley was presented with the new Women’s World Championship and so much more!

In an action-packed Raw main event, The American Nightmare and Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions Kevin Owens & Sami Zayn emerged victorious and handed The Judgment Day a rare defeat. Plus, Logan Paul returned to the red brand to reveal that he had been invited into Money in the Bank Ladder Match and ignited a brawl ensues between all the Money in the Bank Ladder Match participants in the process.

On the final Raw before WWE Money in the Bank,  The American Nightmare geared up for Dominik Mysterio by overcoming major interference from The Judgment Day and reigning supreme over Damian Priest. Plus, Seth “Freakin” Rollins brawled with Finn Bálor, the Women’s Money in the Bank Ladder Match combatants looked to rip each other apart, Matt Riddle helped Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn even the odds against Imperium, Ronda Rousey defeated Raquel Rodriguez and so much more.

On a wild Monday Night Raw, World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins fended off a Damian Priest Money in the Bank cash-in attempt after Finn Bálor inadvertently interfered with his fellow Judgment Day member. Plus, Rhea Ripley retained her Women’s World Title against Natalya, Brock Lesnar and Cody Rhodes engaged in a fierce brawl, Ronda Rousey and Shayna Baszler had a war of words that evolved into physicality and so much more!

Dispute major speculation about The Judgment Day, Finn Bálor, Damian Priest and “Dirty” Dominik Mysterio worked with absolute precision to overcome Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn and World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins in a Six-Man Tag Team Match.

On a rambunctious Monday Night Raw, Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn retained their WWE Undisputed Tag Team Titles against Damian Priest and Dominik Mysterio of The Judgment Day! Plus, Chelsea Green and Sonya Deville were crowned the new WWE Women’s Tag Team Champions, Cody Rhodes vs. Brock Lesnar as well as Seth “Freakin” Rollins vs. Finn Bálor for the World Heavyweight Title were made for SummerSlam, and so much more!

Moments after Seth “Freakin” Rollins made his World Heavyweight Title Rematch against Finn Bálor official for SummerSlam, The Judgment Day followed up the vicious attacks of Kevin Owens, Liv Morgan and Apollo Crews earlier in the night with a brutal beatdown of The Visionary and Sami Zayn.

On the final Raw before SummerSlam, World Heavyweight Champion Seth Rollins and Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champion Sami Zayn overcame Damian Priest and “Dirty” Dom Mysterio. Plus, Brock Lesnar unleashed a brutal beatdown on Cody Rhodes, Rhea Ripley once again targeted Raquel Rodriguez’s knee, Logan Paul took down Ricochet with one punch and so much more.

On an incredible Monday Night Raw, Shinsuke Nakamura leveled Seth “Freakin” Rollins with the Kinshasa moments after he, Rollins and Cody Rhodes beat The Judgment Day! Plus, Chad Gable became the next challenger to Gunther’s Intercontinental Title, Raquel Rodriguez obliterated Rhea Ripley, The New Day made a winning return over The Viking Raiders and so much more!

Although Cody Rhodes was able to capitalize on a mistake by Finn Bálor and Damian Priest to pick up the main event victory on Raw, the full force of The Judgment Day and JD McDonagh was unleashed on The American Nightmare and emerging Sami Zayn in a brutal post-match onslaught.

On a radical Monday Night Raw, Kevin Owens, Sami Zayn and Cody Rhodes earned a decisive win over The Judgment Day after the original main event ended in disqualification. Plus, Chad Gable became the first person to defeat Gunther in singles action, albeit by count-out, Akira Tozawa upset The Miz with a win, Raquel Rodriguez revealed she will face Rhea Ripley at WWE Payback and so much more!

On the final Raw before WWE Payback, Becky Lynch reigned supreme over Zoey Stark in a brutal Falls Count Anywhere Match en route to her Steel Cage Match against WWE Hall of Fame Trish Status this Saturday at WWE Payback. Plus, Raquel Rodriguez brawled with Women's World Champion Rhea Ripley, Shinsuke Nakamura launched another sneak attack on World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins and so much more.

On a legendary Monday Night Raw, Gunther earned his legacy after besting Chad Gable to become the longest-reigning Intercontinental Champion of all time! Plus, Jey Uso arrived on Raw, JD McDonagh seemingly proved himself to The Judgment Day, The Miz interviewed “John Cena” and so much more!

Before a winner could be determined in the Women’s World Title Match between Rhea Ripley and Raquel Rodriguez, Nia Jax suddenly made an earth-shattering return to cost the challenger the contest before attacking The Eradicator in a vicious post-match assault.

With The Judgment Day needing an answer from Jey Uso by tonight, “Main Event” Uso gave them a resounding no! Following Uso’s loss to Drew McIntyre, Cody Rhodes helped Jey thwart the devious group after they attacked Uso as The Scottish Warrior refused to help. Plus, Becky Lynch retained her NXT Women’s Title against Natalya, Shinsuke Nakamura decimated Seth “Freakin” Rollins and so much more!

After a scintillating main event where The Judgment Day defeated Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn, Raw descended into madness as Jey Uso and Cody Rhodes joined Owens and Zayn in brawling with The Judgment Day and JD McDonagh! Plus, “Dirty” Dominik Mysterio retained his NXT North American Title against Dragon Lee, Drew McIntyre turned his back on The New Day, Shinsuke Nakamura chose a Last Man Standing Match for WWE Fastlane and so much more!
Moments after Gunther overcame Tommaso Ciampa in an extremely hard-fought Intercontinental Title Match, Johnny Gargano reemerged on Raw to repel the 3-on-1 attack by Imperium.

New Undisputed WWE Tag Team Champions Cody Rhodes and Jey Uso stood tall after a thrilling main event win over Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn. Plus, Drew McIntyre stopped Damian Priest from cashing in his Money in the Bank contract while lining up a match against World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins at WWE Crown Jewel, Becky Lynch retained her NXT Women’s Title against Tegan Nox and so much more!

In a chaotic Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship Match, The Bloodline's Jimmy Uso emerged on Raw to cost The American Nightmare and “Main Event” Jey Uso big, as Finn Bálor and Damian Priest of The Judgment Day reclaimed the titles. Plus, Intercontinental Champion Gunther retained his title against Big Bronson Reed, and Shinsuke Nakamura defeated Ricochet in a Falls Count Anywhere Match.

Moments after Finn Bálor helped Damian Priest pick up a victory over “Main Event” Jey Uso, Cody Rhodes emerged to unleash an assault on The Judgment Day and send a message to Señor Money in the Bank en route to WWE Crown Jewel. Plus, Women’s World Champion Rhea Ripley incited a chaotic brawl between Nia Jax, Raquel Rodriguez, Zoey Stark and Shayna Baszler before the Women’s World Title Fatal 5-Way Match at WWE Crown Jewel.

After saving Sami Zayn and “Main Event” Jey Uso from a The Judgment Day onslaught, an irate Cody Rhodes joined Zayn and Uso in an explosive counterattack, hit JD McDonagh with two Cross Rhodes onto the announce table and vowed to go through Damian Priest at WWE Crown Jewel.

Following Seth “Freakin” Rollins’ retention of his World Heavyweight Title over Sami Zayn, Raw General Manager Adam Pearce announced that The Judgment Day would face Rollins, Zayn, Cody Rhodes and Jey Uso in a WarGames Match! Plus, The Miz and Zoey Stark became No. 1 Contenders to the Intercontinental Championship and Women’s World Title, respectively, and so much more!

During the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship main event, Drew McIntyre suddenly hit Jey Uso with a Claymore Kick to cost him and Cody Rhodes the opportunity to recapture the titles from The Judgment Day. Plus, several WarGames Match combatants were banned from the building following a chaotic brawl.

Seconds after Drew McIntyre secured the WarGames advantage by defeating Jey Uso, a post-match attack by The Scottish Superstar and Judgment Day was answered with a chair counter-attack and the reveal that Randy Orton will return to join Cody Rhodes, Seth “Freakin” Rollins, Sami Zayn and Jey Uso!

CM Punk spoke in front of the WWE Universe for the first time in nearly a decade! Plus, Randy Orton dispatched “Dirty” Dominik Mysterio, Seth “Freakin” Rollins drew the ire of Drew McIntyre after announcing his next challenger would be Jey Uso, Shinsuke Nakamura blinded Cody Rhodes, The Creed Brothers became the No. 1 Contenders’ to the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Titles and so much more!

Seth “Freakin” Rollins retained the World Heavyweight Title by defeating Jey Uso in an instant classic before Drew McIntyre emerged to assault Rollins and Uso! Plus, The Scottish Warrior bested Sami Zayn before obliterating him backstage, Becky Lynch confronted Nia Jax after Jax’s win over Shayna Baszler, Shinsuke Nakamura vowed to end Cody Rhodes’ story and so much more!

The battle between Cody Rhodes and Shinsuke Nakamura only ended when Nakamura sprayed red mist into The American Nightmare’s eyes! Plus, CM Punk chose to sign with Raw as he came face-to-face with World Heavyweight Champion Seth “Freakin” Rollins, Nia Jax and Becky Lynch went down memory lane, Drew McIntyre took down Jey Uso and so much more!

Georgia Miller arrives in the quaint New England town of Wellsbury with her daughter, Ginny, and her son, Austin, and quickly makes a big impression.
As Ginny struggles to fit in with her new friends, she faces fallout from a night with Marcus. Georgia helps problem-solve for both Paul and Ellen.
During the Sophomore Sleepover, Max bares her heart, Georgia resorts to old, bad habits, and Ginny shares connections with both Hunter and Marcus.
Hunter's aloofness makes Ginny insecure. Max obsesses over a new love interest. Georgia sells Paul on an idea for a fundraiser — then has to deliver.
As Ginny's popularity grows, so do her questions about her own identity. After his night out with Georgia, Paul finds he has new political competition.
Unplanned visitors cause headaches for Georgia and trust issues for Ginny, as more of Georgia's checkered past is brought to light.
On Ginny's 16th birthday, Georgia tries to smooth things over by organizing a surprise party for her — but Ginny and her friends have other big plans.
Ginny draws inspiration from her dad when writing an essay she hopes to submit to a prestigious contest — but the result breeds friction with Hunter.
While Ginny and Georgia both find themselves caught between two men, Max and Marcus face painful situations of different sorts.
As election day approaches for Paul, secrets start to catch up with Ginny and Georgia — and the fallout for both could be steep.
The kids spend Thanksgiving with Zion, who helps Ginny through an emotional ordeal. Georgia has an awkward dinner with Paul's parents.
Georgia worries Nick will reveal what he knows as she schemes her way up the Wellsbury social ladder. At school, Ginny gets an icy reception.
After plotting revenge on a school mom, Georgia opens up about her troubled past to Ginny. Paul moves in with the Millers.
Paul and Georgia clash over her parenting style, Ginny throws a rager, and Cynthia finds love in an unexpected place.
After a night out with Zion, Paul comes home to a startling discovery. Austin receives a surprise visitor at school.
Sparks fly as Paul and Zion's families join the Millers for a holiday dinner. Austin looks for his Christmas gifts — and makes a dangerous find.
Georgia insists on going to Ginny's therapy session, where raw truths emerge. Gil pushes his way into Austin's life and Georgia finds cause to celebrate.
After a sudden behavior change raises concern among his friends, Marcus has a tearful meeting with Ginny. Austin witnesses a terrifying scene.
A buried secret comes to light. Joe and Georgia reminisce. An already heartbroken Ginny overhears upsetting news.
As Gil continues to make threats and Cordova closes in, revelations about Georgia's past surface at the worst possible time.
With all of Wellsbury abuzz about her arrest, Georgia's history of lies threatens to unravel. Facing personal struggles, Ginny and Marcus reconnect.
Georgia and her attorney spar over defense strategy. As Ginny finds a creative way to channel her feelings, Zion weighs what's best for his daughter.
Old sparks — and heartaches — reignite at the school's spring dance. Austin faces rejection in the classroom, while Paul weathers turmoil at the office.
As jury selection begins, Georgia puts her keen observational skills to good use. An impulsive decision jeopardizes Marcus' future.
An explosive testimony transforms the trial. To distract herself from her home life, Ginny connects with an intriguing outsider.
Cut off from support, Georgia hits an emotional rock bottom. Paul's political challenges mount. To ease the tension, Max summons her BFFs.
Desperate to speak with her mom, Ginny relies on Max and Sophie to clear the way. Gil tries to win Austin's trust.
As the prosecution rests, a dramatic shift in the case raises the stakes for Georgia. Ginny opens up to her dad and opens doors with her writing.
Georgia welcomes an unlikely advocate in the courtroom. As the curtain rises on the school musical, emotions run high and painful secrets emerge.
With Georgia's freedom on the line, the trial reaches a dramatic conclusion. Ginny takes a page from her mom's playbook.
오늘은 JJ가 처음으로 학교에 가는 날! 얼마나 새로운 것들을 배우게 될까요? JJ와 함께 노래하고 춤추며 재미있게 수업도 듣고, 친구들과 운동장에서 뛰어보기도 해요.
바닷가에서는 모래성을, 눈밭에서는 눈썰매를! JJ가 이곳저곳 누비며 신나는 여행을 즐기고 있네요. 가족, 친구들과 함께하는 즐거운 시간. 물론 노래도 빼놓을 수 없겠죠?
오늘은 많은 사랑을 받았던 노래들을 JJ와 친구들이 불러줄 거예요. 손뼉 치고 발도 구르며 신나게 춤출 준비 됐나요? 반짝반짝 작은 별과 아기 상어가 기다리고 있답니다!
장난감 자동차도 만들고, 젤리도 만들고, 사라진 동물 친구도 찾아보고! JJ, 친구들과 함께 색깔부터 악기, 알파벳까지 여러 가지를 배워 볼까요?
가족과 함께하는 시간은 언제나 즐거워요! JJ에게는 언제 어떤 상황에나 맞는 노래가 있으니까요. 오늘은 순서를 지키는 법도 배우고, 새로운 춤도 익힐 거랍니다!
태권도 연습을 할 때도, 다섯 가지 감각을 느껴볼 때도 JJ와 친구들은 늘 즐거운 노래와 함께한답니다. 오늘은 또 어떤 재미난 동요가 나올까요?
뛰뛰빵빵 버스 노래부터 빙고 노래까지! JJ랑 친구들이랑 즐거운 멜로디를 배우고, 동물 친구들과 춤도 추고, 태양계에 관한 노래도 불러보아요.
알파벳도 연습하고 손으로 그림자 동물도 만드는 JJ와 친구들. 이제 분장 놀이를 하며 상상력도 발휘해 봐야겠죠? 즐거운 캠핑과 낚시 시간도 기다리고 있답니다.
신나는 버스 여행을 즐긴 다음에는 맛있는 수프도 만들어 보아요. 눈밭에서 숨바꼭질도 하고 자연을 거닐다 보면 저절로 웃음꽃이 핀답니다.
호기심 많은 JJ와 친구들. 사과가 몇 개인지 세어보고, 해변에서 재밌게 놀아요. 도시락을 싸면서 네모, 세모, 동그라미도 찾아볼까요? 새로운 일에 도전할 때 포기하지 않는 법도 배울 거예요.
JJ와 친구들과 함께 노래할 시간이에요. 반려동물 돌보는 법을 배운 다음에는 용암 건너기 놀이가 기다리고 있답니다. 코 잠들기 전에 반짝반짝 작은 별도 바라보아요.
알파벳 수프 만들기, 병원 가기부터 핼러윈 의상 고르기, 눈 내리는 날 성탄 파티 즐기기까지. JJ와 가족 그리고 동물 친구들과 함께 해볼까요?
귀엽고 호기심 많은 JJ가 돌아왔어요. 가족, 친구들과 함께 노래하는 즐거운 시간. '아기 흰고래'도 부르고 '퐁! 터트리자!'도 불러볼까요?
A little kid with a big imagination, Cody loves dinosaurs, games and his new baby sister.
JJ and all his pals make music about trucks, show-and-tell and the holidays to the tune of familiar songs.
Race around in a shopping cart, learn about pilots and celebrate JJ's birthday in this fun, interactive sing-along with JJ and his family.
JJ and his friends love music -- and learning new things! Join them for fun educational songs about the days of the week, numbers, shapes and more.

Cocomelon’s Season 9 is called “Wheels on the Bus”, and it takes place on a school bus with the kids from Cocomelon. At the end of the season, the bus drives past a farm with animals, a construction site with trucks, and a zoo with animals. (lambeteja.com/news/339 )

The kids sing the song “Wheels on the Bus” as they pass by the different sights.

In a grand finale of this thrilling season, the bus triumphantly reaches its destination – a vibrant park with endless possibilities. Like a whirlwind of excitement, the kids hop off the bus, their eager feet hitting the ground, ready for adventure.

The swings beckon with their rhythmic melodies, each sway propelling them to new heights. And oh, the slide! With its twists and turns, it becomes a cascading journey into pure exhilaration. But that’s not all.

The sandbox, a treasure trove of creativity, calls out to their imaginative souls. Castles are built and destroyed, stories unfurl in the soft grains, and laughter becomes the soundtrack.
JJ와 함께 마음이 편안해지는 노래를 부르며 쉬는 시간을 가져보아요. 가족과 친구들, 그리고 모두가 좋아하는 강아지 빙고도 함께 한답니다!
While working the night action desk, FBI agent Peter receives a distress call and is soon put in charge of protecting cybersecurity expert Rose.
After looking for a link between the Campbells and the FBI, Peter is forced to go on the run with Rose in search of a hard drive — and more answers.
Peter teams up with Rose for a risky mission at the White House. Elsewhere, a notable agent joins the security detail for the vice president's daughter.
Rose and Peter seek out one of the Campbells' recent contacts and uncover new intel. Monks opens up to Chelsea. Paulo makes a move on Maddie.
Peter visits someone close to Hawkins. Rose makes a key connection. Maddie’s night out takes a dangerous turn, spurring the Secret Service into action.
With assassins hot on their trail, Peter and Rose split up en route to the White House. A shocking discovery quickly puts their lives in jeopardy.
Now in hiding, Peter and Rose grow closer and investigate a potential bombing suspect. At the White House, the conspirators obtain a disturbing tape.
More truths emerge about the bombing suspect's identity. Chelsea and Peter race to find Maddie after she sends a video with a coded message.
After new revelations surface, Peter and Rose scramble to find more evidence with help from Chelsea and Maddie. A bigger threat looms at Camp David.
With lives at stake, the group tries to stop a nefarious plot before it's too late. In the aftermath, Peter confronts the past and begins a new chapter.
After a disastrous mission in Bangkok, Peter goes AWOL to track an American agent accused of leaking secrets. Meanwhile, Rose receives a disturbing call.
Reunited at last, Peter and Rose race to intercept Warren. Noor weighs using her access to classified Iranian intelligence for her own gain.
Catherine aids Peter's off-the-books investigation into Foxglove while Noor stumbles upon an unexpected encounter. A hijacking spirals out of control.
Peter and Rose infiltrate a party at the Iranian ambassador's home, arousing Javad's suspicion. Tomás and Markus lock horns over the Foxglove plan.
Eager for intel about Night Action, Jacob makes Solomon a lucrative offer. Javad senses a traitor in his midst. Sami undertakes a covert mission in Iran.
Rose grapples with a crisis of conscience. Viktor reveals his true goal to Tomás, and the hunter becomes the hunted when Solomon's team stalks Peter.
Peter plays hardball to force Solomon to talk. Following a lead, Rose seeks answers from a Foxglove scientist — but finds herself in a lethal situation.
Desperate to locate Rose, Peter makes a game-changing deal with Jacob. Tomás discovers just how far Markus is willing to go in service to his father.
Breaching one of the most high-security locations in New York puts Peter's skills to the test. Rose and Dr. Cole enact a daring plan to stop Markus.
With time running out, Peter and Rose scramble to prevent a mass casualty event. Catherine floats an intriguing proposal.

9-year-old Sheldon Cooper is a once-in-a-generation mind capable of advanced mathematics and science but learns that isn’t always helpful growing up in East Texas, a land where church and football are king.
To appease his worried mother, Sheldon employs the techniques of a self-help book to try and make a friend.
When George Sr. is rushed to the emergency room, Connie comes to babysit, and the kids have an adventure getting to the hospital on their own.
After choking on a breakfast sausage, Sheldon wrestles with his fear of solid foods and discovers comic books for the first time.
Sheldon struggles with newfound popularity after utilizing statistics to help the football team.
When a NASA representative visits Sheldon’s school and dismisses his science, Sheldon is set on a mission to prove him wrong.
The kids brainstorm ways to resolve a family feud when Connie refuses to give George Sr. her brisket recipe.
While Mary, Connie and Missy have their girls night at the salon, the three Cooper men plan their road trip to see the space launcher, but it doesn't go as well as they plan.

George Sr. strikes a deal with Sheldon to tutor Georgie when poor grades threaten to keep him from playing football. While Sheldon's tutoring attempts are ultimately unsuccessful, he does learn some skills from his brother.
When Sheldon moves to Dallas to attend a school for gifted children, the family struggles to cope with his absence.
A worried Mary sends Sheldon to Sunday school after she finds him playing Dungeons and Dragons with his friends, Tam and Billy.
Sheldon asks for a computer and unknowingly sparks a heated argument between Mary and George Sr. over the family’s finances.
When flu season hits Medford, Sheldon takes extreme measures to remain healthy.
When Mary takes a job as church secretary, she finds herself becoming Pastor Jeff's marriage counselor. Also, Sheldon and Missy spend their first afternoon home alone.
Sheldon makes friends with an upperclassman who introduces him to a new field of science. Also, Mary and George disagree on how to handle Sheldon's blossoming social life.
A disappointing loss at the science fair sends Sheldon’s life in a new direction.
Sheldon is bullied by an unlikely character, and Mary and George disagree on how to handle the situation.
Mary bans Sheldon from reading a mature comic book. Sheldon decides it's time to stop living under Mary's thumb.
When Sheldon is no longer academically challenged at Medford High, he audits a college class taught by Dr. John Sturgis.
A battle erupts between the Coopers and Sparks when the Sparks' new dog terrorizes Sheldon.
While Sheldon is busy keeping tabs on Connie’s budding relationship with Dr. Sturgis, George Sr. and Mary attempt to bond with their other children.
When Connie is pursued by two gentlemen callers, Sheldon interferes, forcing her to set some ground rules.
After Sheldon dismantles the refrigerator to stop an annoying hum, he gets a paper route to pay for the repairs.
When Dr. Sturgis bonds with Paige, another 10-year-old genius, Sheldon’s jealousy leads Connie to intervene. Mary invites Paige’s family over for a play date.
When Mary’s faith is shaken by a tragedy in the community, Sheldon becomes an unlikely ally.
When George Sr. asks Sheldon to keep a secret from Mary, the stress of not being honest drives Sheldon to hideout at Tam’s for his first sleepover.
When Dr. Sturgis recommends Sheldon and Missy for a university research study on twins, Mary is unhappy when the test results go to Sheldon's head.
Mary clashes with Sheldon's drama teacher over plans for a Halloween fundraiser for the church. Georgie falls for a rebellious teenage girl whom Sheldon is tutoring.

Sheldon gets into trouble with fellow child genius, Paige at the science museum. George is forced to play therapist to Paige’s bickering parents. Mary, Georgie and Missy help Connie with a garage sale.
A video game takes over Sheldon and Connie’s life. George Sr. is jealous when Georgie bonds with Herschel at the auto shop.
Sheldon studies his family for a psychology project. Thanksgiving dinner turns into a family fight when George Sr. is offered a job in Oklahoma.
When Sheldon learns that people with stunted childhoods can turn into social outcasts, he tries to act. Connie and Dr. Sturgis' relationship is tested when she teaches him how to drive.
Sheldon experiments on Missy, and Georgie joins Mary’s bible study to spend more time with his crush, Veronica.
When Sheldon has to spend a few days in the hospital, he turns into the world’s worst patient. Also, Missy gets a taste of what life would be like without her twin.

Sheldon attempts to build a nuclear reactor. Also, a university cocktail party gets heated when Dr. Sturgis’ colleague, Dr. Linkletter, flirts with Connie, and Georgie is heartbroken when he learns Veronica has a boyfriend.
Sheldon uses his new friendship with the school bully to boss Georgie around. Also, Missy steals Connie's makeup for picture day.
Sheldon and Dr. Sturgis have their first fight when Dr. Sturgis marks a question wrong on Sheldon's test. Also, Mary takes over for Pastor Jeff when he's out sick.
Things spiral out of control when Sheldon boycotts his favorite bread company. Also, Georgie offers Veronica a shoulder to cry on when she's dumped by her boyfriend.
Inspired by his hero, Albert Einstein, Sheldon tries his hand at the violin. Also, Mary and Connie secretly buy a pregnancy test when Mary thinks she's pregnant
Sheldon moves in with Dr. Sturgis for the weekend to see what his life will be like in college. Also, a lonely Mary tries to bond with the other Coopers during Sheldon's absence.
Unhappy that school funds are going towards football rather than academics, Sheldon decides to run for class president.
Georgie is thrilled when Veronica stays at the Coopers' house for a few days. Also, Connie and Dr. Sturgis celebrate their one-year anniversary.
The Coopers help Pastor Jeff through a rough patch in his marriage. Also, Sheldon pressures church members for donations when Mary takes him to work for a day.

Sheldon invites the entire school to a party for the Nobel Prize announcements. Also, Connie learns more about Dr. Sturgis' past, and Georgie's desire for cable TV leads to a standoff between him and George Sr.
After Dr. Sturgis experiences a nervous breakdown, Mary worries Sheldon is headed down a similar path. Also, Georgie discovers he has a knack for sales.
Without Dr. Sturgis’ university class, Sheldon must find a new way to stay academically challenged. Also, Mary helps Pastor Jeff avoid temptation with his girlfriend.
Sheldon takes matters into his own hands when Connie refuses to drive him to a lecture with Dr. Linkletter. Also, Georgie tries to impress Veronica with his new business venture
Sheldon is forced to take a break from science when his new obsession with "The Lord of the Rings" leads to an unhealthy habit. Also, Missy asks George Sr. to teach her how to play catch.
After being released from the mental hospital, Dr. Sturgis unexpectedly breaks up with Connie.
A church carnival leads Missy to try out for the baseball team. Also, Connie struggles after her breakup with Dr. Sturgis.
Sheldon starts an internet flame war, and Missy stands up to the boys on her baseball team. Also, Connie is unhappy when George Sr. spends time with her new boyfriend.
The University makes George Sr. a lucrative job offer in the hopes of recruiting Sheldon. Also, Georgie gets a job working for Connie's new boyfriend, and Mary is determined to rid her home of greed.
Mary gets Pastor Jeff involved when Sheldon isn't invited to Billy's birthday party. Also, George Sr. has "male-bonding time" with Dr. Sturgis.
Sheldon fakes being sick to avoid a swim test at school. Also, Dr. Sturgis spies on Connie's new boyfriend.
George Sr. and Connie struggle to manage the Cooper household while Mary plans Pastor Jeff’s wedding.
Sheldon learns to listen when an emotional Paige struggles with her parents’ divorce. George Sr. is furious when Georgie tries to buy his way out of chores.
George Sr. and Georgie go camping with Connie's new boyfriend, Dale, but things get complicated when her ex-boyfriend, Dr. Sturgis, tags along. Also, Sheldon and Missy invent a super-game.
Sheldon and Georgie mine for platinum in roadside gravel. Mary is concerned when Missy misuses religion to help with a batting slump.
Connie meets Dale’s ex-wife, June. Sheldon is forced to work on a group project with reluctant college students.
Sheldon visits CalTech for the very first time. Also, Georgie is furious when Mary listens in on a phone call with his girlfriend, and Connie tries to cheer up a jealous Missy.

Dr. Sturgis is furious when Sheldon accuses him of plagiarism. Also, Mary sets out to find a “girl trophy” for Missy’s end-of-season baseball ceremony, and Georgie has an awkward run-in with Veronica while on a date with his new girlfriend, Jana.
When George Sr. accidentally lands the school librarian in the hospital, the Cooper family must nurse her back to health. Connie gives Georgie relationship advice.
When Sheldon learns the house next door is for sale, he takes it upon himself to find the perfect neighbors. Missy is torn when she’s forced to pitch against her boyfriend at the baseball game.
Sheldon has a scientific breakthrough at the dentist's office. Also, Dale and Connie go to the casino, and Georgie makes a big mistake when Dale leaves him in charge of the store
Sheldon discovers that Mary's been keeping a secret about his future. Also, Connie is furious when she learns Dale fired Georgie.
After graduating high school, Sheldon has a breakdown when he realizes he may not be ready for college. Dale tries to make amends with Connie.
Sheldon gets a summer job at the local train museum. Also, George and Missy bond when Missy embarks on a new stage of womanhood, and Georgie discovers Mary's guilty pleasure.
With college in sight, Sheldon is determined to ride his bike without training wheels. Also, Mary and George Sr. argue over parenting styles.
When their mothers force them to attend Vacation Bible School. Also, George is furious after Georgie makes a questionable purchase.

Dale and Connie work out relationship issues while playing Dungeons and Dragons with Sheldon and Missy. Also, Mary and George take a trip with Coach Wilkins and his wife, and Georgie freaks out when his girlfriend thinks she's pregnant.
College orientation does not go as Sheldon planned. Also, Mary is invited to a party when she's mistaken for a university student, and George Sr. helps Pastor Jeff set up a children's nursery.
Sheldon's first day of college is derailed by his new philosophy teacher, Professor Ericson. Also, Mary and Brenda live vicariously through Missy's first day of middle school.
Connie takes matters into her own hands when Sheldon's philosophy teacher, Professor Ericson, sends him into a tailspin. Also, George Sr. learns Georgie has been cutting class.

Sheldon and George Sr. dine with President Hagemeyer and a university benefactor. Also, Georgie gives Missy some brotherly advice when Mary won't let her go to the school dance, and Dale and June convince Connie to attend their son's wedding.
Sheldon campaigns to become Dr. Linkletter's lab assistant. Also, Georgie enlists the help of Mr. Lundy, the drama teacher, for a surprising business venture.
Dr. Linkletter pushes Sheldon to make friends with his fellow students at college. Also, Georgie gets a pager.
Sheldon, Dr. Linkletter and Connie team up on a science experiment. Also, Mary is jealous that Pastor Jeff and Brenda are spending time together, and Georgie has a new side hustle.

Sheldon refuses to ride in a car after getting into an accident with Connie. Also, Missy uses their trauma to her advantage at school and Connie is forced to take the church shuttle while her car is in the shop.
When the IRS accuses Sheldon of making a mistake, he'll stop at nothing to prove them wrong. Also, Dale is forced to get a colonoscopy and tries to convince Connie to join him.

Sheldon is caught in a moral dilemma when offered a bootleg copy of a computer game he can't afford. Also, Mary and Connie take Brenda out for girls' night while George Sr. and the guys watch Billy, and Missy asks Georgie to take her and Marcus on a secret date.
Sheldon finds himself at odds with Paige once again when she considers enrolling at East Texas Tech. Also, Mary seeks June's advice when looking for a change.
The Coopers discuss the possibilities of black holes and alternate universes when Dr. Sturgis comes over for dinner.
Missy's first heartbreak triggers a series of events that lead the Cooper family to the brink.
Sheldon and Missy both run away from home, and Mary gets upsetting news about George Sr.
Sheldon encourages Missy to question the Bible. Also, Connie is determined to catch George Sr. in a lie, and Mary helps Pastor Jeff search for a youth pastor.
Sheldon tries to convince Dr. Sturgis to return to the university. Also, Georgie upsets the family when he makes a life-changing decision.
Sheldon, Missy and Georgie adapt to new living arrangements. Also, Connie opens a gambling room.
Sheldon and Dr. Linkletter struggle to solve an equation. Also, Georgie has a solution for Connie's business woes, and George Sr. gives advice on Missy's love life.
Missy asks some uncomfortable questions at church, and Connie and Georgie go into business together.
Sheldon takes his first engineering class with Professor Boucher. Also, Meemaw and Dale help take care of his ex-wife, June.
Sheldon battles President Hagemeyer's mysterious boss over the university's science requirements. Also, Mary discovers that Georgie is working at Connie's illegal gambling room.
Sheldon gets the science yips and has to learn how to not think. Also, George Sr. plays handyman at Brenda Sparks' house.
Sheldon gets a dorm room all to himself. Also, Connie gains an unwanted business partner.
Sheldon acts as Mary's spy during a youth lock-in at church. Also, Georgie is attracted to an older woman, Mandy.
Sheldon attends his first comic book convention; Mary tries selling makeup.
Sheldon makes friends with his dorm neighbors; George Sr. learns his job is in jeopardy.
Sheldon butts heads with Dr. Lee, a new scientist in the lab. Also, Mary is given a lotto ticket.
Sheldon joins Dr. Linkletter and Dr. Sturgis on a science road trip. Also, Georgie continues to lie about his age.
Connie's gambling room is a success, and Sheldon dips his toe in the stock market. Also, Missy starts a business.
Sheldon gets an odd request from an old friend, Paige. Also, George Sr. and Mary are caught in the middle of Connie and Dale's breakup, and Georgie comes clean to Mandy.
Sheldon copes with the death of a hero. Also, Missy wants to babysit, and Georgie struggles with his big secret.
George and Mary insist on meeting the new woman in Georgie's life. Also, Sheldon and Missy have suspicions about what's going on with their family.
Sheldon and Missy learn about Georgie's pregnancy, and the whole family promises to keep it a secret.
As the church congregation gossips about Georgie, Missy stands up for her brother, and Sheldon is distracted by the family drama.
Sheldon struggles to cope with the first signs of puberty. Also, Mary and George Sr. hunt for new jobs, and Georgie and Meemaw take a business trip across the border.
George Sr. bails Connie and Georgie out of jail. Also, Sheldon and Missy meet Mandy, and Mary feels unwelcome at church.
Sheldon and Missy try to help the family’s finances. Also, Mary struggles to find her footing without the church.
Sheldon must choose sides in an ethical dilemma. Also, Mary tries her hand at writing and Mandy needs a new place to live.
Sheldon makes a terrifying mathematical discovery while tutoring Billy. Also, Mary is jealous of Missy's relationship with Mandy and Connie.
At college, Sheldon decides to expand his responsibilities and become a dorm resident advisor. Also, Connie and Dale make a sketchy business deal, and Mary and George Sr. rekindle their romance.
George Sr. is asked to help with the football team. Also, Mandy discovers Georgie and Connie's secret business.
Sheldon's search for a comic book leads him to a breakthrough. Also, Georgie and Mandy have an uncomfortable first encounter with her parents, Jim and Audrey.
Sheldon's database invention puts him at odds with the university. Also, the church takes issue with Connie's video store.
Sheldon considers dropping out of college to focus on building his database. Also, George Sr. is frustrated when someone else gets credit for his football wins.
Mary struggles to make new friends while Mandy pushes Georgie to date another woman.
Sheldon learns the university is building a database without him. Also, Mary takes care of a bedridden Mandy and Meemaw.
Mary butts heads with Mandy's mother, Audrey, and Sheldon attempts male bonding.
Paige drags Sheldon to a college party and Missy gets caught in a lie.
The Coopers can't be found as Mandy goes into labor. Also, Sheldon is excited about the launch of his database.
Sheldon confronts the failure of his database. Also, Georgie and Mandy struggle as new parents and Missy feels forgotten.
Missy steals her dad's truck and hits the road with her friend Paige.
Georgie goes on a birthday date and Mary confronts Brenda about her relationship with George. Also, Sheldon takes an interest in Missy's favorite TV show.
Sheldon wants to search for life on other planets and Mandy answers Georgie's marriage proposal. Also, Missy is caught between two friends.
Mandy gets an exciting job opportunity and Sheldon worries that he's falling behind. Also, Georgie takes his daughter to work.
The gambling room gets broken into and Sheldon wants to study abroad. Also, Missy makes a new friend.
Mandy surprises Georgie with a spa weekend and Sheldon prepares for his summer in Germany.
Sheldon and Mary head to Germany while the rest of the Cooper family braves a tornado that is heading straight for Medford.
News of the tornado reaches Sheldon and Mary in Germany. Also, with the Cooper house in chaos, Missy steps up.
Sheldon realizes he is the weakest student in his class; Meemaw is looking to expand her gambling business.
Sheldon explores Germany behind Mary's back, Missy attempts to pull a fast one on George Sr. and Meemaw and Dale adjust to living together.
Missy steps up, Mary has a surprise for George, and Sheldon finds his dorm occupied.
Sheldon helps his roommate try to beat the stock market, Missy and Billy Sparks throw a party, and Mary finds a new church.
Georgie and Mandy's wedding plans pit Mary against Mandy's mom, Audrey, with baby CeeCee caught in the middle.
Georgie and Mandy get married! Meanwhile, Meemaw's gambling room gets raided.
Sheldon studies to be Meemaw's lawyer when she is put on house arrest, and the Coopers have a plumbing emergency.
Sheldon's published paper leads to a frenzy of grad school recruiting, and Georgie tries to speak more properly in front of his daughter.
Connie gets assigned a tough probation officer, and Georgie takes marriage advice from his father-in-law.
George Sr. is worried that Mary wants another baby and gets a vasectomy behind her back. Meanwhile, Drs. Linkletter and Sturgis go to Sheldon for science tutoring.
George Sr. gets an exciting job offer, and Sheldon prepares for his move to California.
The Cooper family grapples with the death of George Cooper Sr.
Sheldon leaves East Texas for the California Institute of Technology following the death of his father.
A therapist and his family move across the country to escape their troubled past but quickly discover that their new home comes with its own horrific baggage.
Vivien and Violet get themselves caught in a dangerous situation. Meanwhile, Ben goes back to Boston to fix a mistake that he made.

Vivien learns the horrific truth about the house's first residents and Ben's visitor causes him to further unravel about what really happened in the haunted house. Constance and Moira have their history revealed.
The line between the living and the dead blurs on Halloween. Two of the house's previous residents give the Harmons decorating advice.
Tate comes face to face with his past, and Ben and Vivien are haunted by a new houseguest before Halloween night comes to an end.
Constance enlists Violet's assistance with Tate. Ben helps a new patient confront his fears.
Moira persuades a buyer to make an offer while Constance and Larry work against her efforts.
The man in the rubber suit is revealed.
One of history's most famous murder victims pays the house a visit. Constance discovers more of Tate's bad behavior.
Violet learns about the rules of the house. The truth about Larry's condition is explained. Constance is interrogated by the police.
Vivien gives birth. Tate and Violet attempt to rid the house of some of its ghosts for good.

In the aftermath of family tragedy, Ben tries to take his child out of the Murder House. Meanwhile, Violet and Vivien accustom themselves to their new living arrangements, Constance raises Tate's child as her own and a new family buys the house.
Terrifying evils blur the boundaries between reality and insanity at the Briarcliff Manor.
An exorcist is called to Briarcliff to help save a troubled farm boy; Sister Jude's darkest secret is revealed.
A violent storm allows a group of patients to plan a daring escape; Sister Jude is haunted by her past.
A new patient exposes Arden's past; Kit learns why Grace was admitted to Briarcliff.
Sister Jude employs a renowned Nazi hunter to gather evidence against Arden; Kit makes a surprising confession; Bloody Face is unmasked.
A mysterious little girl is abandoned at Briarcliff; the Monsignor makes a Faustian pact with Dr. Arden; the origin of Bloody Face is revealed.
Sister Mary Eunice is terrified to discover a dark angel at Briarcliff; Kit makes a bold move to be reunited with Grace.
A murderous Santa wreaks havoc on Briarcliff; Sister Jude faces off with the devil; Arden has a shocking encounter in the death chute.
The Monsignor takes an unlikely convert under his wing; Lana secures a new piece of evidence that can exonerate Kit; Dr. Arden witnesses a miraculous return.
The Monsignor confronts the Devil. Dr. Arden’s experiments reach a shocking conclusion. Dr. Thredson facilitates a surprising reunion for Kit.
Grace tells Kit devastating news about the aliens' experiments on Alma; Dr. Thredson receives an unexpected visitor; the Monsignor goes to extreme lengths to silence Jude.
A deadly new inmate threatens Sister Jude's chance of release; Grace's obsession with the aliens turns violent.
Johnny sets out to complete his father's work; Lana leads the charge to finally shut down Briarcliff.
A young girl discovers she possesses a strange genetic affliction tracing back to the dark days of Salem; Fiona Goode returns to town.
Fiona helps Zoe and Madison deal with a horrible tragedy; Delphine LaLaurie struggles to adjust to modern life; Cordelia faces a dark decision about her family.
Fiona takes on an unlikely protégé; a guilt-ridden Zoe tries to give Kyle his old life back; Madison has a fiery exchange with Joan Ramsey.
Fiona's choices rattle a decades-long truce between the Salem witches and Marie Laveau; the Council of Witchcraft pays a surprise visit to the academy with disturbing allegations.
Besieged by Marie Laveau's army, Zoe unleashes a new power; Fiona and Myrtle clash over control of the coven; Madame LaLaurie is confronted by old ghosts.
Zoe, Queenie and Nan make contact with a dark spirit trapped in the academy; Cordelia's new power brings on a heartbreaking revelation.
Fiona finds purpose in a dangerous love affair; Queenie questions her place in the Coven; Cordelia makes a decision about her mother.
Cordelia rallies the girls in the fight to stop Fiona; a dangerous new enemy puts Misty in the cross hairs; the rivalry between Marie Laveau and Delphine comes to a head.
Cordelia’s attacker is revealed. Fiona looks to form an alliance with Marie Laveau. Nan learns a disturbing truth about Luke’s past.
Fiona attempts to out the new supreme with a visit from Stevie Nicks; Cordelia learns the truth about Hank and the witch hunters; Madison tries to eliminate her competition for the supremacy.
Fiona and Laveau have a deadly face off with The Corporation; Cordelia makes a desperate sacrifice.
Cordelia's latest vision puts the coven's future in question; the girls manifest powerful new gifts; Queenie's search for Marie Laveau leads her to hell and back.
A new Supreme rises.
One of the only surviving sideshows in the country struggles to stay in business during the dawning era of television; police make a terrifying discovery at a local farmhouse.

A citywide curfew threatens to shut down the freak show; a strongman from Ethel's troubled past arrives at camp; Gloria arranges a terrifying play date for Dandy; the Tattler Twins reveal a talent that could knock Elsa from the spotlight.
The freaks refuse to perform on Halloween due to an old carny superstition; Jimmy is smitten by a woman claiming to be a fortuneteller; Ethel receives life-changing news.
Edward Mordrake continues his search for a Freak to add to his ghostly coterie. Elsa tells the grisly story of her days in Germany. Jimmy and Maggie have a run-in with the Twisted Clown.
Stanley and Maggie hatch a plan to murder the Freaks. Gloria hides the evidence of Dandy's gruesome new hobby. A health scare reveals Desiree may not be the oddity she once thought.
Elsa unveils a dangerous new act. Stanley puts pressure on Maggie to murder Jimmy. Paul indulges in a secret romance.
The women of the Freak Show rally against Dell after his latest act of violence. A strange encounter with Dandy raises Jimmy’s suspicion about the clown murders.
Recent disappearances around camp raise Ethel’s suspicion of Elsa. Gloria makes a last ditch effort to contain Dandy’s bloodlust.
In the wake of a tragic loss, Jimmy sinks into a drunken despair. A reading from Maggie spurs Dandy to action. Stanley and Elsa track down the Twins.
The death of a Freak sparks troubling behavior in Pepper. Elsa reveals the history of the Freak Show. Desiree grows suspicious of Maggie.
Elsa prepares for her move to Hollywood. The Twins grow enamored with a traveling salesman. Dell plots Jimmy’s escape from police custody.
Dandy gives the Twins troubling information about Chester. Maggie vows to prove her loyalty to Jimmy. The Freaks enforce their harsh code of justice.
The Freaks rebel against new management. Dandy prepares for his debut performance. Elsa arrives in Tinseltown.
Detective and family man John Lowe investigates a chain of gruesome murders in Los Angeles. A mysterious tip points him to the enigmatic Hotel Cortez.
Fashion mogul Will Drake brings couture to the Hotel Cortez. A model catches The Countess's eye. John learns about the hotel's sadistic first owner.
Alex is pushed to her breaking point after Scarlett stirs up memories of Holden. Donovan is targeted by a dangerous rival of The Countess.
John receives an invitation to attend an exclusive Devil's Night Soiree. Alex tries to diagnose Holden's strange condition.
Alex uses an unconventional treatment to save a dying patient. A Halloween-hating couple tests Iris’s limits.
Ramona and Donovan enact their plan for revenge. Liz Taylor finds true love. The resident of Room 33 is revealed.
Will Drake’s renovations uncover one of the Hotel’s greatest secrets. John undergoes psychiatric evaluation. The Countess learns the fate of her first love.
John closes in on The Ten Commandments Killer. Sally’s arrangement with March is revealed.
The Countess is reunited with her one true love. Donovan and Ramona take another stab at revenge. A careless decision lands Alex in hot water.
Alex enlists John's help to contain an outbreak. Donovan learns the Countess' true intentions. Liz and Iris plan to leave the hotel for good.
Ramona draws vitality from an unlikely source. Sally uses her past to negotiate her future. Scarlett learns the truth of her family's affliction.
Iris and Liz oversee a new era at the Cortez. John and Alex struggle to adapt to life outside the hotel.
A young interracial couple move into a farmhouse in North Carolina after purchasing it with their life savings. However, unearthly phenomena begin occurring and things are not what they seem.
While the Millers discover some of their house's history, Lee falls into old habits and her daughter, Flora, makes a new friend.
Nightmares become an inescapable reality as unique stories of people's lives in America reveal the astonishing power of the supernatural.
Scathach presents herself for the first time and reveals what she wants. However, Tomasyn and the ghost settlers have other plans.
The mob comes for Shelby, Matt and Flora, but they get help from a new face to escape the Butcher's wrath.

After the wrap of the show My Roanoke Nightmare, the producer creates a follow up show called Return to Roanoke, bringing the actors of the previous show and the real Shelby, Matt, and Lee, back to the house.
Audrey, Lee, and Monet find themselves in grave danger as they search for Rory; Agnes comes back for revenge; Matt and Shelby deal with the ramifications of their situation.
Audrey, Monet, and Lee remain hostages of the Polks, while Shelby and Dominic try to think of a way to escape the wrath of The Butcher back at the house.

A new actor shows up to the house per Sidney's request; three young adults enter the woods to shoot footage of the blood moon and the history of the house for the web. Meanwhile Lee, Monet, and Audrey remain on the run.
Lee Harris, the lone survivor of Return to Roanoke: Three Days in Hell, agrees to an interview live on television, the Lana Winters Special.
After Trump is elected President, Ally Mayfair-Richards is beset by all of her old phobias... and they appear to be coming to life.
Ally, Ivy and Oz meet the new neighbors. Kai runs for city council. Detective Samuels investigates a murder. A blackout terrorizes Ally.
The community turns on Ally after she shoots and kills a Hispanic man. At home tensions between Ally and Ivy grow worse, and Kai may be Ally's only hope.
Kai gathers familiar faces to join his cult as the events surrounding 11/8/17 are explored.
Kai asks for the cult members to prove their loyalty against one of their own. Meanwhile, Ally meets with Rudy to tell him about her problems dealing with Ivy's departure.

Ally takes Meadow to Rudy in the hopes that she will confirm her story about the cult. However, Meadow has a change of heart. Meanwhile, an unexpected opponent runs against Kai in the city council election.
Kai begins to solidify his grasp on power after winning the election. A mysterious woman warns Beverly, Ivy and Winter that Kai will soon cast them aside.
Ally confronts Kai meanwhile Winter must choose between Kai and Beverly when he makes a questionable decision.
Kai seeks to test the loyalty of his cult. Ally seeks revenge. Oz learns about his parentage.
Kai receives visits from Charles Manson as he begins to question everyone around him.
Kai sets his master plan into motion as Ally's true intentions are revealed.
The end of the world happens when the bombs drop, and the survivors wonder if surviving is worth it after the Cooperative gives them shelter.
A new occupant arrives at the Outpost with alarming news, causing a domino effect of lust, betrayal and self-destruction.
As Ms. Mead grapples with her identity, Michael reveals more of his; Coco's ex rears his ugly head; Venable crafts a plan to give the residents of Outpost 3 one magical night.
Michael's history as a teenager, and how he came to find himself at the Hawthorne Boy's school, is revealed.
After witnessing the Apocalypse, Coredelia must act quickly to stop Michael or face the end of days.
Madison and Behold travel to the Murder House to uncover the origins of Michael Langdon.
Cordelia takes steps to punish the traitors among the coven and stop Michael from rising to power as the Antichrist.
Michael questions his father's unholy plan for world annihilation, and is directed on the proper path to recover Miriam.
Michael strikes at the school, but Cordelia, Myrtle, and Mallory escape him. Mutt and Jeff step in to guide Michael to his destiny, and recruit Wilhelmina to administer the Outposts.
The surviving witches travel to Outpost 3 to stand in final battle against the Antichrist.

In the summer of 1984, five friends escape Los Angeles to work as counselors at Camp Redwood. As they adjust to their new jobs, they quickly learn that the only thing scarier than campfire tales is the past coming to haunt you.
Darkness descends upon the camp. Although it’s lights out, evil has no curfew.
Imitation is the best form of tragedy. Coming clean can be pretty messy.
Mr. Jingles closes in on the one who got away as the counselors rally to escape Camp Redwood.
As twilight broaches, the survivors brace for a final brawl.
With the horrors of the night behind them the survivors deal with the fallout of their choices.
A hidden chapter of Camp Redwood is revealed. The survivors help a stranded hitchhiker.
A deadly trio emerges, hell-bent on unleashing a new era at Camp Redwood. Our former counselors desperately try to keep history from repeating itself.
Camp Redwood draws in a lost soul looking for closure.
A struggling writer, his pregnant wife, and their daughter move to an isolated beach town for the winter. Once they're settled in, the town's true residents begin to make themselves known.
A quick fix for Harry's writer's block has unexpected side effects. Two eccentric locals offer Harry a helping hand.
Harry's newfound talent brings an unexpected visitor to town. Alma decides to take matters into her own hands.
The dark history of Provincetown and its residents are brought to light.
Harry struggles to keep Alma under control. Doris is pushed past her limits.
Ursula devises a sinister plan. The Gardners write their final act.
A group of college students on a camping trip are swept up in a horrifying and deadly conspiracy decades in the making.
The President struggles with the morality of a deal he must make.
An unexpected visitor arrives at the White House and reveals the details of a very horrific plan.
Mamie takes matters into her own hands. The fate of the future is revealed.
Mysterious deaths and disappearances ramp up in the city. A doctor makes a frightening discovery, and a local reporter becomes tomorrow's headline.
Gino grapples with his trauma. Patrick's search takes him to dark places. A stranger contacts Hannah with a grave warning.
Without the NYPD's help, Gino is forced to get resourceful. A traumatizing event brings dangerous suspects closer than ever.
As darkness consumes the city, evil takes root in the unlikeliest of places...
Hannah receives concerning news while Patrick suffers a loss; the city's most dangerous resident reveals his true motives.
A chilling event from Patrick’s past returns to haunt him. Gino and Henry are determined to uncover it at any cost.
Patrick's search reaches an epic conclusion; the group shifts its focus, but a different plan is in store for Hannah.
Terrifying events at Fire Island rupture the group and force them to reconsider everything.
As vitality expires, two old friends are led through unique journeys of retrospection.
Grief and peril dominate Gino; the discovery of a tragedy becomes a revelation for Adam.

After multiple failed attempts of IVF, actress Anna Victoria Alcott wants nothing more than to start a family. As the buzz around her recent film grows, she fears that something may be targeting her - and her pursuit of motherhood.
It’s awards season and Anna is primed to be a major player in contention. After a frightening encounter convinces her that she’s being followed, she begins to question who she can trust.
As Anna and Dex settle into their Hamptons sanctuary, the comfort begins to fade. Her circle of trust is slowly shrinking, and doubt creeps into Anna’s head - could the evil be right under her nose?
With help from Siobhan, a major announcement helps restore Anna’s public image. Behind closed doors however, something powerful seems to be taking over.
Anna senses the dark presence closing in on her, closer than ever. Ms. Preecher reveals pieces of her past and may know the truth about what's happening to Anna and Dex.
A glimpse into Anna's past reveals why she craves motherhood, while Dex's troubling family life is dragged into the spotlight.
Entrenched in her grapple for fame and motherhood, Anna may be involved in a cycle much bigger - and older - than she realizes.
The world around Anna is starting to crescendo in every way: her career path continues to skyrocket, while her personal life is more stressful than ever - just in time for Hollywood's big night.
Her choices have unknowingly led to deadly consequences, but Anna can still have it all - for a price.
Former President George Mullen's comfortable retirement is upended after he's asked to lead an investigation into a horrific cyberattack.
Mullen's commission investigates a hacking ring. President Mitchell weighs retaliation. A powerful figure has demands for Roger.
Mullen's initial arrests draw blowback from the public — especially TV pundit Evan Green. Alex faces pressure to investigate her father.
A shock to the financial system increases scrutiny on Mullen's commission. Valerie investigates Proteus. Roger must make a difficult choice.
A personal tragedy reopens old wounds for the Mullen family. Speaker Dreyer pushes for a change in leadership. Sheila testifies before Congress.
A new threat creates further unrest across the nation. As he narrows in on the culprit, Mullen is faced with an agonizing decision.

Masha heads out into the forest on an adventure, and stumbles across an empty house in the forest. Bear returns to find his house in shambles, with our fun-loving young girl the cause of it. After leaving her in the dark forest, he fears for her safety and goes to retrieve her - eventually discovering it’s OK to have fun.

Bear’s plans for a restful hibernation are put on hold when Masha releases some angry bees in his home. Now fully awake, Bear prepares a meal for a very hungry Masha. Unfortunately, a tired Masha falls asleep in Bear’s bed, eaving Bear to share his meal with his friend the Wolf.

It’s Christmas, and Bear has big plans to decorate the house for Santa’s visit. Unfortunately, they are put on hold as Masha pays a visit, ruining his decorations. As the duo heads out to replace Bear’s tree, Masha again causes trouble – but this time with Santa – who ends up bedridden. It’s now up to Masha and Bear to deliver Santa’s presents to the forest animals.

It’s spring time! Bear happily wakes from a peaceful hibernation, and finds a beautiful Lady Bear enjoying some quiet time at the local lake. Eager to spend some quiet time alone with her, Bear is challenged by a Rival Bear who competes for Lady Bear’s affections. Bear comes to realize that friendship is a very valuable thing.

The Bear goes fishing. In anticipation he slings his fishing rod but as soon as the first fish swallows the bait, Masha appears and transforms a pleasant fishing trip into a nightmare. The Bear makes a fishing rod for Masha as well in order to entertain her and she immediately catches the Goldfish.

Bear is again forced out of a restful sleep when Masha rolls a huge snowball into his home. After a fun game of snowball toss, Masha and Bear come across some animal tracks. Bear does his best to explain what animals made which tracks, but Bunny is not making it any easier.

A very hungry pair of wolves (Sly and Silly) kidnap Masha to try and trade her for Bear’s fridge full of food. Nothing goes as planned when Masha’s curiosity again causes all sorts of trouble for the duo. Bear is not worried, knowing hat Masha is a real handful, and will likely find her way back to Bear’s house once the wolves grow tired of her.

A funny interpretation of the old fable about “the boy who cried wolf”. The Bear gives Masha a cell phone so that she will be safe. Masha’s repeated calls for trivial reasons result in the Bear not answering the phone when she does find herself in real danger.

It’s time to make home made jam, but Masha spoils Bear’s plan when she spills his pot of boiled preserves, leaving him with none to put in jars. Bear sets out looking for more fresh fruit, but comes back with an empty basket. Luckily Bear returns to find Masha has created some interesting jams of her own – which actually turn out to be very tasty.

Eager to learn how to skate like a pro, Masha wakes Bear to get his help teaching her how to skate. Getting a hibernating bear out of bed isn’t an easy task, though. With a bit of effort, Masha gets Bear down to the frozen lake where Lady Bear is already enjoying some alone time. Hopefully Bear and Lady Bear can help Masha learn the steps.

School is in session as Bear builds Masha a new desk and turns his home into a classroom. Being a teacher to an energetic young girl isn’t easy, but Bear does a very good job teaching Masha how to read and write. After taking a nap, Bear learns that leaving Masha alone with some tools might lead to a big surprise when he wakes up.

Bear and Bunny decide to grow some carrots in his garden. After Bunny eats some carrots before they are ready, Bear kicks him out of the garden. It’s hard work constantly watching out for Bunny, so a sleepy Bear asks Masha to help him play guard while he gets some sleep. Masha chases off the intruder, and Bear makes sure Bunny does not come back again.

Bear just wants to sit alone at home and do crosswords, but Masha won’t let that happen. As Bear always learns, when Masha wants to play, there’s no turning her down. Bear tries and tries to finish his crossword puzzles while playing hide-and-seek, but finds out that’s a very hard thing to do.
